Detailed Description: ADD FULL GAME TO YOUR WISHLIST About the Game We are developing this short experience into a new full game called Imagined Leviathans, which will greatly develop the gameplay and themes into a full 2-3 hours of play, with improved visuals and significantly more to do and see, including meeting other survivors “At fifty degrees below zero frostbite can strike in as few as five minutes” A poetic survival horror set in a future where climate change has rendered Britain an arctic wasteland. On your pilgrimage to Steel Henge you can only take what you can carry, so choose carefully what you leave behind. Immerse yourself in this starkly monochromatic world as you scavenge for fuel, take shelter in the shadows, and burn stories to stay warm. A malevolent presence lurks between the words, just out of reach. Alone, you must sacrifice everything you knew to deliver the bitter truth of this world to future generations. A brief but intense 20 minutes.
Short Description: Imagined Leviathans is a narrative survival game set in a frozen British village. Explore the countryside and unite the survivors to face down your Leviathans together.

Detailed Description: Hello! This is the second chapter of the Ice Star Story, all began then the peaceful and far mining colony was attacked by the raiders, cruel and greedy people, they did all they want, murder and thievery, and even they enslaved many people to work for them on their factories. This time your mission is to try and end all the terror, and save your people from the hands of bandits, even they got payed to secure the secret laboratory only, and do no harm to anyone, but they did not listen and do what they want, that is why our hero, the captain, have to prepare to the battle and use any resources he can get, to win this battle! As in the first chapter, here too, our hero can find and use many different items and weapons to use, collect any information to move on, and free his team, but raiders learn from the first battle and will try and stop you, they change their tactics, and put more man on guarding their base. The futures in the game are the Score that you get by defeating your enemy, and it will make others to change their opinion about you, some new weapons and open world that reacts to players movements, you can try and play as stealthy as you can to attract as less as possible attention to you, or go Rambo and do your thing! Controls are: (you can save and load the game as in the first chapter of this game) W,A,S,D to move , Shift to sprint, Space to jump, E to use or take items, F for flashlight, Mouse to rotate the view or shoot, even that in this Chapter is the day light, still in some places flashlight can be useful :) Thank's

Detailed Description: This is a game based on struggling and the unbending will of those who try. Unbeliever urges you to face the challenge of pushing through and conquering your obstacles. As you progress you recall your memories and with them your powers. You will learn to manipulate the elements and exploit your enemies' weaknesses. Each fight requires a unique approach. This is more of an action rather than a platform game and an experiment on 2D combat mechanics. You can dodge, push your enemies back, burn them, or even send them back through time. The efficiency of your powers depend on your character development choices and on what path you choose to specialize on. Earn the right to challenge the Unbeliever by slaying beings of great power. You start with nothing and fight your way to the top. The story is explained through the form of memories that you unlock by making progress in the game. You gain spells and experience to upgrade your stats.Your ultimate goal: find the Unbeliever that killed the Old Gods and get your memory back. Recall your memories as you delve deeper into this cursed world. With every little bit of progress you make, you will remember something. The lore of the world will be explained through the memories you recall. Some of them give you information about locations or enemies and some give you new spells. How you develop your character is entirely up to you. There are 7 different stats that you can invest in. Health: The amount of pain you can standPower: The potential to cast spells and tumbleAttack: The damage you deal with your regular attacksTechnique: Defines your attack speed, jump distance and dodge distanceHatred: Offensive spells increase the damage they dealGuilt: Affects trick spell parametersDefiance: Affects the most powerful and rare spells. Furthermore there are at least 5 secrets in each map that reward you with XP, or as they are called fragments.
Short Description: Traverse through a broken world and recall your memories. With each step you take you regain your lost powers. Develop your character however you like and find your true self.

Detailed Description: In Gravitational, we are a few decades in the future. Humanity continues to prosper and the race to discover new technologies grows every day. Play as Sebastian, a physically challenged scientist of Gravcorp who leads and develops the gravitational project. Now he has to overcome a big challenge, the collapse, and the inaccessibility on the path until the reactor. MOVE WITH A WHEELCHAIR After an accident, Sebastian lost movement on his legs and then started to use a wheelchair. Move yourself using the motorized and traditional modes. ENTER GRAVITATIONAL FIELDS This is one of the technologies Gravcorp has been testing for a while. Everything floats inside gravitational fields, even Sebastian. HANDLE ENVIRONMENT OBJECTS Sebastian combines one of his creations with some other Gravcorp’s technologies. This way, he can handle some heavy objects from a certain distance, making his tasks a little bit easier. Through the mechanics and the story of the game, face challenges in inaccessible places and also understand the conflicts and traumas that Sebastian experienced, both for being a person with a disability, and for being one of the greatest scientists behind this new technology. Gravitational is an entertainment game, at the same time that it has a strong message about accessibility , reflection , and empathy with people with disabilities.
Short Description: Gravitational is a VR experience that takes place in an upward future, where gravitational technology is being discovered. Experience Sebastian, a scientist in the apex of collapse inside Gravicorp’s facilities, overcoming not only challenges on your way but also your traumas.

Detailed Description: Explore space and save humankind in AGOS : A Game of Space. Travel through different star systems, build and pilot space probes, collect resources and develop the technologies you need to face the dangers of space and ultimately save humankind. BECOME A SPACE PILOT Experience an innovative realistic physic based gameplay. ANALYSE, ADAPT, EVOLVE Build your probes, unlock new parts, improve your ship to face all the dangers that space can offer to unwary travellers. A UNIQUE VR EXPERIENCE Get into the cockpit, use your controllers to pilot, improve and customize your ships. Play for hours thanks to the motion sickness free system.

Detailed Description: Our chopper tailed-out after taking a hit... the pilot won’t be leaving the ground again. Now I have to lead my weary platoon back to our lines through the jungles and paddy fields. Entering what appears to be a friendly village - only to find it is a cover for a guerrilla faction - is just one of the things that helps our insomnia... that and the elusive psycho in my squad – I gotta figure out who he is before the morale factor becomes our worst enemy. Jeez, will this stupid war never end?! Back in the day when most games fell firmly into one camp such as shoot ‘em up, adventure, arcade action or map-based strategy, Lost Patrol was unusual in that it fused together elements of all these genres and more. With a combination of styles that tested a player’s entire gamut of skills, this 1990 release picked up fans on the popular platforms of the day – the Amiga, Atari ST and (for the relatively few PC gamers at the time) MS-DOS. Appearing in many ‘top 100’ lists, Lost Patrol is fondly remembered by those that played it, and is now available officially on Steam for the first time, courtesy of Pixel Games UK. The general action takes place on a military map, through which you are tasked with navigating a squad of men whose helicopter has crash-landed after an attack by the pesky guerrilla fighters. At certain points however the game field will switch view, requiring your arcade shooting skills, some hand-to-hand combat or other such surprises. Praised in its day for the quality of these additional graphic scenes, you’ll quickly realise why Lost Patrol is considered a retro classic!
Short Description: We’re fit, we’re alive, but we’re not back home In this classic multi-genre DOS game, take command of the seven survivors of a U.S. helicopter crash in Vietnam, desperately trekking across 57 miles of harsh terrain infested with booby traps and enemy soldiers.

Detailed Description: CHECK OUT MORE GAMES About the Game An old curse has trapped the Furry Heroes in a secret cave. Word has it they were from different times but no one has ever met them. After years of mystery, Aldebarick, the King of Ravinstara offered a huge reward to those who unveil this story. To help the adventurers, Calik, a powerful moose was summoned to guide them and finally, your moment has come. Get your equipment, prepare your brain (and hands) to be fast enough to discover who are the Furry Heroes cursed in this place. Furry Heroes is a game in which you need to unscramble the tiles to release a unique hero and to remove its body curse, you need to follow the magic pattern before time's up. Also, the game brings dialogue elements so that you can learn more about the heroes as well as your role in the adventure. Last but not least, you'll play the whole adventure with all characters fully animated, including all heroes that will be naked. Features 3 types of gameplay; Dialogue System; A short narrative mixed with mini-games;
Short Description: Unscramble the tiles to release a unique hero, Follow the magic patterns To Remove their Body Curses before time's up, and Perform a magical extraction. But DON'T FORGET! To be sure the curse was completely removed, you need to check their natural bodies. Enjoy fully animated heroes.

Detailed Description: Practical Shooting Simulator contains a wide variety of features for creating stages, exercise planning, and testing abilities in practical shooting. Not just a game, but a unique tool for organizers, competitors, and all enthusiasts of Practical shooting. The Stage, Planning, Character, and Firearm Editors introduce you to the most important aspects of practical shooting. Stage Editor 3D space, an intuitive interface, and special tools make it much easier to create dynamic, correct, and interesting stages of any complexity. Select rules, scoring method, discipline, and divisions. Place targets, partitions, and other obstacles to shape the shooting exercise. Share your stage setup with friends and colleagues. Save a snapshot of the final version of your shooting range in print-friendly format, to help you build the stage in real life. Planning Editor Start your training with theory - use the Planning Editor and a robust Actions Sequence System, to help you form the method of completing the stage. Upon completing the stage, use detailed statistics to identify weak points, which help you optimize your actions. Experiment with alternative routes of completing the stages to achieve the best results. Bring theory and ideas from the simulator into reality. Firearm Editor Choose your firearm model from an extensive arsenal for all existing disciplines: handgun, shotgun, rifle, multi-gun. Customize your firearm with modules and devices for an added personal touch. Enter parameters of firearm mastery for each model to ensure a more accurate shooting simulation. Character Editor Create your character - customize your appearance, clothes, and equipment from many available options. Enter the required parameters for abilities and skills. All entered parameters are used for correct calculations in the Actions Sequence System. Changing the parameters clearly affects your performance in the completion of the stage.

Detailed Description: It's a busy summer day on an allotment site in northern England. The fruit trees are laden with ripe apples and cherries, the carrots are ready to be picked, and then, there's the maintenance to crack on with. Nobody wants a dirty plot notice. What starts as a day of part-time agricultural endeavour, quickly turns to terror in this hand-drawn, point-and-click adventure with interactive fiction elements. Common worms have mutated into carnivorous killers, bent on transforming Britain into a land of zombies. Even worse, you can't find your digestive biscuits! Rake leaves, burn weeds, pick fruit, and fight for your life.

What starts as a day of part-time agricultural endeavour, quickly turns to terror in this hand-drawn, point-and-click adventure with interactive fiction elements. Common worms have mutated into carnivorous killers, bent on transforming Britain into a land of zombies. Even worse, you can't find your digestive biscuits! Rake leaves, burn weeds, pick fruit, and fight for your life.

Game Name: STORY OF SEASONS: Pioneers of Olive Town
Detailed Description: STORY OF SEASONS: Pioneers of Olive Town + Expansion Pass Set This set includes the STORY OF SEASONS: Pioneers of Olive Town game and its Expansion Pass featuring 14 sets of DLC. This expansive bundle will enhance your life on the farm even further with new characters, costumes, and more! ◆ Additional Outfits • Pete and Claire's Overalls • Yuto and Naomi's Hoodies • Henry and Holly's Western Attire • Animal Attire (Protagonists) • Animal Attire (Marriage Candidates) • School Uniforms (Protagonists) • School Uniforms (Marriage Candidates) • Yukata Set (Protagonists) • Yukata Set (Marriage Candidates) ◆ Sub-scenarios • Olive Town Mystery Files • The Legendary Sprite Dance ◆ Marriage Candidate Expansion Packs • Windswept Falls Expansion Pack • Terracotta Oasis Expansion Pack • Twilight Isle Expansion Pack * The protagonist outfits will become available once you have completed the town development request to build the salon. You may then commission the outfits from Karina. * All protagonist outfits can be worn regardless of gender chosen. * To change the marriage candidates' outfits, select Downloadable Content from the title screen, then enable the outfits in the Apply Downloadable Content menu. * Marriage candidate outfit sets are not available for marriage candidates added in the Expansion Packs. * The sub-scenarios are small sets of quests, events, and outfits that are separate from the main game's scenario. * Marriage Candidate Expansion Packs are based on past titles in the STORY OF SEASONS series, and include a new area, 2 townsfolk, and 2 marriage candidates each. About the Game Build Your Farm From the Ground Up! Welcome to Olive Town, a peaceful community established by your trailblazing grandfather and his friends. Now that you've taken over his farm, it's your job to carry on his legacy. Plant crops, raise animals, build relationships, and get to know the residents of your new home in this brand-new entry in the STORY OF SEASONS series! Cultivate Your Farm, Cultivate Your Town Tame the wilderness and build your farm from the ground up! Gather and process materials to fulfill requests and improve Olive Town's infrastructure, upgrade tools, or commission new outfits and accessories. A Farm of Endless Possibilities Clear the land, repair old facilities, and place new ones wherever you see fit. Level up your farming skills and craft a variety of decorations and facilities, from fences and automatic feeders for livestock to sprinklers for crops! New Adventures Off the Beaten Path Finding Earth Sprites while exploring your farmland may lead you to mysterious, fantastical lands such as gardens where the seasons never change, an island in the sky, or even the inside of a volcano! There's Always Something Going on in Olive Town! Participate in local festivals and watch the town come to life! Get to know your neighbors better with over 200 unique events, and you may even find love with a special someone!

Detailed Description: Hover Attack is a side-view robot shooter. Take control of an attacker with a limited number of bullets and try to destroy the target at the end of the game while killing enemies. When you run out of ammunition, you can replenish your supply by combining with your Carrier, and since the game is over even if your Carrier is hit by a certain number of bullets, it is important to keep your Carrier in a safe place. The original story was first published in 1984 in the PC magazine I/O (published by Kogaku-sha), and was so popular that it was ported to a number of consoles and later released as a commercial version. Many boys have dreamed at one time or another of being the pilot of a robot anime hero, such as Gundam. This game was so popular that it was later released in a much more powerful version, and ports were released for most of the major 8-bit PCs of the time. It is more than a one-on-one fighting game but less than a side-scrolling beat 'em up. The gameplay is unique in that there is a main character Attacker and a Carrier that the Attacker rides, and the two must work together to survive. The enemy can also deploy Attackers and Carriers that must be destroyed. The following three versions are included. * I/O version (port of the original) * Full version (port of the original) * The Ultimate Evolution version (a much-arranged version) In addition to the I/O version, there is also the Construction yesterday. Mods are also supported, so you can create the world you want and play with it.
Short Description: Hover Attack, the definitive version of the robot action game that became a huge hit in 1984 and was ported to various consoles, is now available on STEAM with a port of the original game and an Ultimate Evolution version that dramatically evolves the gameplay with enhanced graphics and sound!

Detailed Description: A miniature frozen between the atmosphere of a small room and Castaneda with Lovecraft. The story of radical spiritual practices in the search for truth among panels and stacks. To find out what happened to the mechanic from Nizhnevartovsk, you will have to write his story on your own. Schastye is a kind of walking simulator within the room, meditation to the noises of everyday life or just a visual novel. First of all, this is an artistic manipulation with word and form, only then - a game. Features: Atmosphere of the beginning of 00-th in the CIS Unique musical accompaniment The opportunity to hate or love the game Short duration (15-25 minutes)

Detailed Description: ADD FULL GAME TO YOUR WISHLIST About the Game We are developing this short experience into a new full game called Imagined Leviathans, which will greatly develop the gameplay and themes into a full 2-3 hours of play, with improved visuals and significantly more to do and see, including meeting other survivors “At fifty degrees below zero frostbite can strike in as few as five minutes” A poetic survival horror set in a future where climate change has rendered Britain an arctic wasteland. On your pilgrimage to Steel Henge you can only take what you can carry, so choose carefully what you leave behind. Immerse yourself in this starkly monochromatic world as you scavenge for fuel, take shelter in the shadows, and burn stories to stay warm. A malevolent presence lurks between the words, just out of reach. Alone, you must sacrifice everything you knew to deliver the bitter truth of this world to future generations. A brief but intense 20 minutes.

Detailed Description: Hello! This is the second chapter of the Ice Star Story, all began then the peaceful and far mining colony was attacked by the raiders, cruel and greedy people, they did all they want, murder and thievery, and even they enslaved many people to work for them on their factories. This time your mission is to try and end all the terror, and save your people from the hands of bandits, even they got payed to secure the secret laboratory only, and do no harm to anyone, but they did not listen and do what they want, that is why our hero, the captain, have to prepare to the battle and use any resources he can get, to win this battle! As in the first chapter, here too, our hero can find and use many different items and weapons to use, collect any information to move on, and free his team, but raiders learn from the first battle and will try and stop you, they change their tactics, and put more man on guarding their base. The futures in the game are the Score that you get by defeating your enemy, and it will make others to change their opinion about you, some new weapons and open world that reacts to players movements, you can try and play as stealthy as you can to attract as less as possible attention to you, or go Rambo and do your thing! Controls are: (you can save and load the game as in the first chapter of this game) W,A,S,D to move , Shift to sprint, Space to jump, E to use or take items, F for flashlight, Mouse to rotate the view or shoot, even that in this Chapter is the day light, still in some places flashlight can be useful :) Thank's

Detailed Description: This is a game based on struggling and the unbending will of those who try. Unbeliever urges you to face the challenge of pushing through and conquering your obstacles. As you progress you recall your memories and with them your powers. You will learn to manipulate the elements and exploit your enemies' weaknesses. Each fight requires a unique approach. This is more of an action rather than a platform game and an experiment on 2D combat mechanics. You can dodge, push your enemies back, burn them, or even send them back through time. The efficiency of your powers depend on your character development choices and on what path you choose to specialize on. Earn the right to challenge the Unbeliever by slaying beings of great power. You start with nothing and fight your way to the top. The story is explained through the form of memories that you unlock by making progress in the game. You gain spells and experience to upgrade your stats.Your ultimate goal: find the Unbeliever that killed the Old Gods and get your memory back. Recall your memories as you delve deeper into this cursed world. With every little bit of progress you make, you will remember something. The lore of the world will be explained through the memories you recall. Some of them give you information about locations or enemies and some give you new spells. How you develop your character is entirely up to you. There are 7 different stats that you can invest in. Health: The amount of pain you can standPower: The potential to cast spells and tumbleAttack: The damage you deal with your regular attacksTechnique: Defines your attack speed, jump distance and dodge distanceHatred: Offensive spells increase the damage they dealGuilt: Affects trick spell parametersDefiance: Affects the most powerful and rare spells. Furthermore there are at least 5 secrets in each map that reward you with XP, or as they are called fragments.
Short Description: Traverse through a broken world and recall your memories. With each step you take you regain your lost powers. Develop your character however you like and find your true self.

Detailed Description: In Gravitational, we are a few decades in the future. Humanity continues to prosper and the race to discover new technologies grows every day. Play as Sebastian, a physically challenged scientist of Gravcorp who leads and develops the gravitational project. Now he has to overcome a big challenge, the collapse, and the inaccessibility on the path until the reactor. MOVE WITH A WHEELCHAIR After an accident, Sebastian lost movement on his legs and then started to use a wheelchair. Move yourself using the motorized and traditional modes. ENTER GRAVITATIONAL FIELDS This is one of the technologies Gravcorp has been testing for a while. Everything floats inside gravitational fields, even Sebastian. HANDLE ENVIRONMENT OBJECTS Sebastian combines one of his creations with some other Gravcorp’s technologies. This way, he can handle some heavy objects from a certain distance, making his tasks a little bit easier. Through the mechanics and the story of the game, face challenges in inaccessible places and also understand the conflicts and traumas that Sebastian experienced, both for being a person with a disability, and for being one of the greatest scientists behind this new technology. Gravitational is an entertainment game, at the same time that it has a strong message about accessibility , reflection , and empathy with people with disabilities.
Short Description: Gravitational is a VR experience that takes place in an upward future, where gravitational technology is being discovered. Experience Sebastian, a scientist in the apex of collapse inside Gravicorp’s facilities, overcoming not only challenges on your way but also your traumas.

Detailed Description: Explore space and save humankind in AGOS : A Game of Space. Travel through different star systems, build and pilot space probes, collect resources and develop the technologies you need to face the dangers of space and ultimately save humankind. BECOME A SPACE PILOT Experience an innovative realistic physic based gameplay. ANALYSE, ADAPT, EVOLVE Build your probes, unlock new parts, improve your ship to face all the dangers that space can offer to unwary travellers. A UNIQUE VR EXPERIENCE Get into the cockpit, use your controllers to pilot, improve and customize your ships. Play for hours thanks to the motion sickness free system.

Detailed Description: Our chopper tailed-out after taking a hit... the pilot won’t be leaving the ground again. Now I have to lead my weary platoon back to our lines through the jungles and paddy fields. Entering what appears to be a friendly village - only to find it is a cover for a guerrilla faction - is just one of the things that helps our insomnia... that and the elusive psycho in my squad – I gotta figure out who he is before the morale factor becomes our worst enemy. Jeez, will this stupid war never end?! Back in the day when most games fell firmly into one camp such as shoot ‘em up, adventure, arcade action or map-based strategy, Lost Patrol was unusual in that it fused together elements of all these genres and more. With a combination of styles that tested a player’s entire gamut of skills, this 1990 release picked up fans on the popular platforms of the day – the Amiga, Atari ST and (for the relatively few PC gamers at the time) MS-DOS. Appearing in many ‘top 100’ lists, Lost Patrol is fondly remembered by those that played it, and is now available officially on Steam for the first time, courtesy of Pixel Games UK. The general action takes place on a military map, through which you are tasked with navigating a squad of men whose helicopter has crash-landed after an attack by the pesky guerrilla fighters. At certain points however the game field will switch view, requiring your arcade shooting skills, some hand-to-hand combat or other such surprises. Praised in its day for the quality of these additional graphic scenes, you’ll quickly realise why Lost Patrol is considered a retro classic!
Short Description: We’re fit, we’re alive, but we’re not back home In this classic multi-genre DOS game, take command of the seven survivors of a U.S. helicopter crash in Vietnam, desperately trekking across 57 miles of harsh terrain infested with booby traps and enemy soldiers.

Detailed Description: CHECK OUT MORE GAMES About the Game An old curse has trapped the Furry Heroes in a secret cave. Word has it they were from different times but no one has ever met them. After years of mystery, Aldebarick, the King of Ravinstara offered a huge reward to those who unveil this story. To help the adventurers, Calik, a powerful moose was summoned to guide them and finally, your moment has come. Get your equipment, prepare your brain (and hands) to be fast enough to discover who are the Furry Heroes cursed in this place. Furry Heroes is a game in which you need to unscramble the tiles to release a unique hero and to remove its body curse, you need to follow the magic pattern before time's up. Also, the game brings dialogue elements so that you can learn more about the heroes as well as your role in the adventure. Last but not least, you'll play the whole adventure with all characters fully animated, including all heroes that will be naked. Features 3 types of gameplay; Dialogue System; A short narrative mixed with mini-games;

Detailed Description: Practical Shooting Simulator contains a wide variety of features for creating stages, exercise planning, and testing abilities in practical shooting. Not just a game, but a unique tool for organizers, competitors, and all enthusiasts of Practical shooting. The Stage, Planning, Character, and Firearm Editors introduce you to the most important aspects of practical shooting. Stage Editor 3D space, an intuitive interface, and special tools make it much easier to create dynamic, correct, and interesting stages of any complexity. Select rules, scoring method, discipline, and divisions. Place targets, partitions, and other obstacles to shape the shooting exercise. Share your stage setup with friends and colleagues. Save a snapshot of the final version of your shooting range in print-friendly format, to help you build the stage in real life. Planning Editor Start your training with theory - use the Planning Editor and a robust Actions Sequence System, to help you form the method of completing the stage. Upon completing the stage, use detailed statistics to identify weak points, which help you optimize your actions. Experiment with alternative routes of completing the stages to achieve the best results. Bring theory and ideas from the simulator into reality. Firearm Editor Choose your firearm model from an extensive arsenal for all existing disciplines: handgun, shotgun, rifle, multi-gun. Customize your firearm with modules and devices for an added personal touch. Enter parameters of firearm mastery for each model to ensure a more accurate shooting simulation. Character Editor Create your character - customize your appearance, clothes, and equipment from many available options. Enter the required parameters for abilities and skills. All entered parameters are used for correct calculations in the Actions Sequence System. Changing the parameters clearly affects your performance in the completion of the stage.

About the Game: It's a busy summer day on an allotment site in northern England. The fruit trees are laden with ripe apples and cherries, the carrots are ready to be picked, and then, there's the maintenance to crack on with. Nobody wants a dirty plot notice. What starts as a day of part-time agricultural endeavour, quickly turns to terror in this hand-drawn, point-and-click adventure with interactive fiction elements. Common worms have mutated into carnivorous killers, bent on transforming Britain into a land of zombies. Even worse, you can't find your digestive biscuits! Rake leaves, burn weeds, pick fruit, and fight for your life.

Game Name: STORY OF SEASONS: Pioneers of Olive Town
Detailed Description: STORY OF SEASONS: Pioneers of Olive Town + Expansion Pass Set This set includes the STORY OF SEASONS: Pioneers of Olive Town game and its Expansion Pass featuring 14 sets of DLC. This expansive bundle will enhance your life on the farm even further with new characters, costumes, and more! ◆ Additional Outfits • Pete and Claire's Overalls • Yuto and Naomi's Hoodies • Henry and Holly's Western Attire • Animal Attire (Protagonists) • Animal Attire (Marriage Candidates) • School Uniforms (Protagonists) • School Uniforms (Marriage Candidates) • Yukata Set (Protagonists) • Yukata Set (Marriage Candidates) ◆ Sub-scenarios • Olive Town Mystery Files • The Legendary Sprite Dance ◆ Marriage Candidate Expansion Packs • Windswept Falls Expansion Pack • Terracotta Oasis Expansion Pack • Twilight Isle Expansion Pack * The protagonist outfits will become available once you have completed the town development request to build the salon. You may then commission the outfits from Karina. * All protagonist outfits can be worn regardless of gender chosen. * To change the marriage candidates' outfits, select Downloadable Content from the title screen, then enable the outfits in the Apply Downloadable Content menu. * Marriage candidate outfit sets are not available for marriage candidates added in the Expansion Packs. * The sub-scenarios are small sets of quests, events, and outfits that are separate from the main game's scenario. * Marriage Candidate Expansion Packs are based on past titles in the STORY OF SEASONS series, and include a new area, 2 townsfolk, and 2 marriage candidates each. About the Game Build Your Farm From the Ground Up! Welcome to Olive Town, a peaceful community established by your trailblazing grandfather and his friends. Now that you've taken over his farm, it's your job to carry on his legacy. Plant crops, raise animals, build relationships, and get to know the residents of your new home in this brand-new entry in the STORY OF SEASONS series! Cultivate Your Farm, Cultivate Your Town Tame the wilderness and build your farm from the ground up! Gather and process materials to fulfill requests and improve Olive Town's infrastructure, upgrade tools, or commission new outfits and accessories. A Farm of Endless Possibilities Clear the land, repair old facilities, and place new ones wherever you see fit. Level up your farming skills and craft a variety of decorations and facilities, from fences and automatic feeders for livestock to sprinklers for crops! New Adventures Off the Beaten Path Finding Earth Sprites while exploring your farmland may lead you to mysterious, fantastical lands such as gardens where the seasons never change, an island in the sky, or even the inside of a volcano! There's Always Something Going on in Olive Town! Participate in local festivals and watch the town come to life! Get to know your neighbors better with over 200 unique events, and you may even find love with a special someone!

Detailed Description: Hover Attack is a side-view robot shooter. Take control of an attacker with a limited number of bullets and try to destroy the target at the end of the game while killing enemies. When you run out of ammunition, you can replenish your supply by combining with your Carrier, and since the game is over even if your Carrier is hit by a certain number of bullets, it is important to keep your Carrier in a safe place. The original story was first published in 1984 in the PC magazine I/O (published by Kogaku-sha), and was so popular that it was ported to a number of consoles and later released as a commercial version. Many boys have dreamed at one time or another of being the pilot of a robot anime hero, such as Gundam. This game was so popular that it was later released in a much more powerful version, and ports were released for most of the major 8-bit PCs of the time. It is more than a one-on-one fighting game but less than a side-scrolling beat 'em up. The gameplay is unique in that there is a main character Attacker and a Carrier that the Attacker rides, and the two must work together to survive. The enemy can also deploy Attackers and Carriers that must be destroyed. The following three versions are included. * I/O version (port of the original) * Full version (port of the original) * The Ultimate Evolution version (a much-arranged version) In addition to the I/O version, there is also the Construction yesterday. Mods are also supported, so you can create the world you want and play with it.
Short Description: Hover Attack, the definitive version of the robot action game that became a huge hit in 1984 and was ported to various consoles, is now available on STEAM with a port of the original game and an Ultimate Evolution version that dramatically evolves the gameplay with enhanced graphics and sound!

Detailed Description: BIG UPDATE! Ver2.0Update big update, additional scenarios, additional CG, new bosses, and a true roguelike dungeon/b] Fuckin' dress up roguelike shooter action game Zarandara is an action game in the style of a bullet-hell roguelike. The power of Shakti allows you to recover Mp through sexual intercourse, and when your climax gauge is at its maximum, your Hp and Mp are fully recovered. You can use slashes to cancel bullets and destroy terrain with some weapons. By acquiring items, the heroine can get piercings and change her outfit. Get weapons and other items in dungeons to get the upper hand in the battle against the giant killing weapon Giga Flame! STORY Zarandara, the emperor, priest, and strongest warrior of the Asuras, is turned into a sex-crazed monster by a supernatural being as punishment for failing to protect his beloved wife, Vrinda. At the same time, the mysterious Black Carnage appears all over the Indus continent, indiscriminately killing all humans. Zarandala and his wife, Vrinda, are led by the mysterious Vedic tribe, the Mofini, on a grueling journey to stop the Black Carnage by destroying the killing weapons and performing the Shakti Ritual in various locations. SYSTEM Every time you attack, you will consume MP, which can be recovered by performing a sexual act called Shakti Charge. You can recover MP by performing a sexual act called Shakti Charge. There is a cool time after the enemies attack, so choosing whether to attack or recover is the key to victory. You can also use slashes to eliminate the enemy's barrage. Treasure chests contain weapons, dash performance upgrades, and items that power up your Hp and Mp. In addition, by collecting Zepto Machines, which are dropped when you defeat enemies, you can start from the beginning in the custom menu, raise your level, open up the entire MAP, and advance the action in your favor. The weather will randomly change from day, to evening, to night, plus over 40 songs will randomly play! *If you have difficulty in clearing the game on a high difficulty level, we have implemented a complete invincibility mode as a help function, so please use it if you are not good at action. *The heroine's pregnancy mode will be unlocked after defeating the last boss.

Detailed Description: Deadlane is a horror/racing game which pits the player against five contestants in a race for survival. Inspired by asymmetrical horror games such as Dead by Daylight and beloved racing franchises such as Need for Speed. As a multiplayer horror-survival game, Deadlane aims to expand the genre by blurring the line between hunter and victim. At the start of each lap, the last-ranking racer will be transformed into the ghost racer known as Grim Prix. The Grim Prix curse holds many perks as it increases the player's speed while also being immune to on-road obstacles. However, the player possessing the Grim Prix curse will ultimately be eliminated at the end of the lap - regardless of where they ranked in the race. To avoid elimination, players must land a fired projectile into another player in order to pass the Grim Prix form onto them. The new Grim Prix will then teleport to the last-ranking position, starting the chase all over again. As each lap ends, playing as Grim Prix risks elimination. This cycle continues until only four survive until the final lap, in which 4 positions are decided - Gold, Silver, Bronze and the last to be eliminated. Some may wish to play as the hunter to gain an early lead, whereas others may want nothing to do with it all together. The choice is yours as only the most strategic racers are rewarded. Early Features: On-road obstacles such as evil spirits, who stalk every street and can spawn by racers at any given time. The freedom to choose from a wide gallery of atmospheric tracks, each as unforgiving as the last. A single player mode just as dynamic as its multiplayer counterpart, suited for those seeking a more focused experience. Time trials which forcefully test your ability to stay alive. And many more to come!
Short Description: Chase or Be Chased - Deadlane is a horror/racing game which pits you against five contestants in a race for survival. Blur the line between the hunter and hunted as you outlive opposing players and blaze your path to victory.

Detailed Description: 這是一個由神族掌控的世界。 作為一位在伊薩卡大陸上生存的弱小人類，我們，無能為力。 直到身為少年的你帶來了決定性的轉變。 在這裡你將被迫面臨各種選擇，決定命運與世界的走向。 是該服從世界的命運，還是要掙脫一切，將命運掌握在自己手中? 在這片大陸上，有許多不一樣的物種，你身為一個弱小的人類，你該怎麼做? 是選擇踏上尋找自己存在的價值所在，還是默默地生活在偏鄉一角，直到生命的終結，這一切，都是你自己的選擇。 來吧，做出屬於你的選擇。

Detailed Description: Albert Aardt is the captain of the space ship BRT-34, which has been drifting on the far edge of the milky way due to an engine malfunction for more than 200 years. One day, the cryo tube of the Association of Free Scientists - the destroyed organization that once belonged to albert-materializes next to his ship. Having picked up the cryo tube, the captain receives an order for its delivery. The game is a mix of a visual novel, a classic quest, and a turn-based RPG. However, if you want, you can disable the RPG component, and enjoy the game as a normal visual novel with quest elements!

For video creators and streamers KIMIDORI SOFT permits monetization through partner programs using KIMIDORI SOFT games. # This game is radio control style operation. In a city where humans have disappeared, you'll be able to operate an AI forklift, one of the AI machines that are still working. An open-world sci-fi forklift adventure in which you must solve the truth of the mystery while completing the requests of other AI machines. Why did the humans disappear? How was the AI created? Play mode: The main play mode is mouse selection and click, and when switching between different play modes, there will be multiple keyboards wsad (up, down, left, and right), space keys, etc., and there will be a Chinese and English explanation in the lower left corner of the game

Game Name: VIETNAM WAR PLATOON 越战排 (AI WAR Game)
Developer: Two Thousand and one entertainment studios
Publisher: Two Thousand and one entertainment studios
Detailed Description: Game Features： This game is a new concept card and flag game with the theme of Vietnam War. It is a light snack game prepared for the leisure transition of players who are tired of playing large-scale games like me and hand injured players. AI liberates the hands of players, players no longer need to repeat to complete the mechanical labor and tired operation, just need to observe the battle situation. You can experience the unpredictable battlefield situation and leisure war without hands operation Game systeam Features： Brand-new gameplay concept, custom settings, Chinese and English pictures, random map system, random combat methods If the feedback from players and the market is good in the future, various DLCs will be launched, such as Australian Army, South Vietnamese government army, international joint force, etc. there will be more new weapons to experience! Live broadcast room of game producers http://live.bilibili.com/5365754 Highly random intelligent AI is not a traditional routine game AI soldiers inside will use various weapons and props to attack the player team, or call fire strike to continuously output group damage. Because it is highly random, even if the player has the strongest team and equipment combination, it may not guarantee the absolute victory in each battle. Each weapon of U.S. and Vietnamese forces has its own hit rate, killing effect and attack range Other content, Personal Free Multiplayer MOD Game （ST8 MOD VI The Mummy Returns ）Download Large multi player + single player mod game https://42amsterdam.net/samforum/showthread.php?t=2342 新概念的回合制卡牌游戏，主打EVE模式，玩家将可以解放自己双手来进行战斗，完全随机的作战方式，让玩家更加难以估计每次战斗的走向，越南战争的背景让玩家体验一般当年枪林弹雨，战火纷飞的越战时刻！ 这款游戏，是以越南战争作为背景主题的休闲懒人操作的回合制新概念卡牌战旗类游戏，专门为类似我这类大作玩腻了和手残玩家休闲过渡准备的轻度零食游戏。 原创类 和 非固定套路和非传统机制的新概念且充满军事风味的全新类型回合制卡牌游戏，主打EVE模式，玩家将可以解放自己双手来进行战斗，完全随机的作战方式，让玩家更加难以估计每次战斗的走向，越南战争的背景让玩家体验一般当年枪林弹雨，战火纷飞的越战时刻！ 这款游戏，是以越南战争作为背景主题的休闲懒人操作的回合制新概念卡牌战旗类游戏，专门为类似我这类大作玩腻了和手残玩家休闲过渡准备的轻度零食游戏。 试玩版只提供一种模式，只有1回合，没有存档功能，没有故事模板，没有难度选项，武器只有基础武器，没有随机地图系统。 游戏制作人的B站直播间 http://live.bilibili.com/5365754 高度随机 智能AI 不是传统的套路游戏 非 你打我下 我打你下 里面的AI士兵会使用各种武器和道具攻击玩家队伍，或者呼叫火力打击持续输出群体杀伤 因为是高度随机，玩家就算拥有最强的团队和装备组合也不一定确保在每场战役中获得的绝对胜利。美军和越军的武器有一样的也有差异巨大的 每把武器都有自己的 命中率 杀伤效果 攻击范围 传统卡牌游戏 每次出牌都是需要玩家手操 但是结果都是随机 显得非常费劲和麻烦 这个则是直接全自动 玩家当指挥官观察战况即可 AI解放玩家的双手，玩家再也不需要重复去完成机械劳动与劳累的操作，只需要观察战况即可。 无需双手操作 也可以体验变化莫测的战场战局和休闲战争 （无手的残疾人也可以玩的游戏，极度简化又不失深度的游戏，类似AK47 随便教下就可以得心应手 战局基本不重复） 越战排 其他介绍 游戏算是最大化简化了操作模式，只把有用的模块保留下来，繁琐的模块都全部卸掉了，只保留实用性的模块，好比AK47的最简化理念 ， 此外游戏还提供了 半自动和全自动的操控模式 玩家可以手动控制攻击操作也可以让电脑系统来全局操控小分队的一切作战和技能输出。 其实 一点都不复杂的 只是因为加入了英文翻译 所以看起来很复杂 整个游戏就2个操作即可玩转 小孩稍微看上几分钟都会玩的那种 大部分时候看缘分 有时候一方可能1个人都不死就可以歼灭对方全部小分队的人力，对方火力 武器 装备好不一定能够打赢对面的差装备的小分队，或者是有时候看起来会输了 但是手气不错 数次反扑打出高伤害直接逆转战局也有，没有神装神器和变态人物这些。 平衡性不一定是决定胜负的关键，有时候走运的好运气也是逆袭和决胜负的利器。 游戏已经100%完工了的 STEAM规定上架游戏必须有15天的宣传期 得等到 下个月的9月12号才会自动解锁 试玩版是9月1号解锁 日后玩家和市场反馈不错的话，会推出各种DLC 比如说澳军 南越政府军 联合部队 等DLC内容 将会有更多全新的武器可以提供体验！

Detailed Description: War Identity is a free to play high-adrenaline competitive first person shooter set in the remains of the once great urban centers of the US. Following a global pandemic and nuclear disaster, as food and water became more scarce than weapons, civilians took up arms to secure their own survival . Now, all across the shell scarred land of the nation, survivalist militias do battle with UMSC remnants for the few resources that remain. Are you a Marine fighting to preserve the union or a survivalist fighting to feed your community? What is your war identity? War Identity is free to play. Updated weekly with new features and improvements. Connect your War Identity profile on our website to showcase your stats Multiplayer (6v6) has the following game modes: Team Deathmatch Free for All Capture the Flag Last Man Standing Domination Gun Trial Zombies Co-op Game Mode Survive the waves and see if you can become #1 on the leaderboards with our zombie survival co-op game mode. New features will be added to the zombies game mode. Some features of the game: 35 Weapons Gun Customization 4 Weapon Loadout Slots Experience System with 112 Levels Clans Ammo Care Package Killstreaks Token Store 20 Unlockable Characters 50+ Weapon Camos 50+ Dances Emotes Daily TK Loot Boxes Earned Stamina Attribute Per Character Competitive Modes Leaning Lefty Mode Battle Pass Steam Friends Current Roadmap: Battle Royale Mode (10% completed) Inventory/Backpack (0% completed) Perks for inventory (0% completed) Twitch voting game bonuses (40% completed)

Detailed Description: Super difficult! Physics-unfriendly action! This is an action game in which you move with your hoof. This robot can't walk or jump normally. It just hangs and shifts its weight. The Z and X keys each correspond to a grab and release motion. If you accidentally let go and fall off, you have to start over at the checkpoint! Let's swing and fall our way to the goal far beyond! You're welcome to play and stream live! All 9 stages Synopsis Dr. Wells has created a dream machine called MONKEY BARS ROBOT I'm going to brag to the world about it. But we can't let the doctor's stock go down. We'll make sure he stays in line. How to operate ↓↓←↑Shift center of gravity selection X or Z Grab Release Space Pause Screen Decision Esc Exit Game Play time We expect a minimum of one hour.

Game Name: S H R i M P
Detailed Description: The Darkness Confessed. S H R i M P is a third person platformer where you play as a Shrimp set in a bewildered VOID. You take on the mantle of completing a ritual that had been abandoned. Only the first step is clear of this ritual which is to collect all the cars. During this journey of collecting cars on levels you come across horrific entities roaming around trying to prevent you from completing the ritual. You cannot fight back or engage into combat. Best you can do is use your abilities to escape Death Struggles from the surreal entities or calm the Shrimp from gaining too much anxiety. Endure the trial and seek the truth. IMPORTANT MESSAGE S H R i M P receives updates from time to time and I plan to add so much more free content to the game. To clear the air for those that do not know. S H R i M P is game I developed solo back in 2020. It is my first ever full game and holds a special place in my heart. I spent 6 months on the project before publishing it. The game was completed from start to finish. Fast forward to now, I add free content updates for the game and do my best to listen to fans of the game and even put fan art in the game IF they are okay with it. Game Features: Basics The full game includes 20 levels total with loads of skins and headwear for the Shrimp. You can find some skins/headwear hidden on levels and buy them in the store with coins you pick up. There are three difficulties present in the game. There is Endurance, Purgatory and Sinner. Each difficulty adds a new challenge. These new challenges are detailed within the game’s difficulty screen. I did add a peaceful mode to the game so you can play the game and enjoy the atmosphere without entities around trying to stalk you. Furthermore, there is now level difficulty option which changes how hard the level will be. Mechanics The Stereo is the most important element to calming the Shrimp taking away the anxiety. Listening to music on the stereo is not mandatory on all levels while on some it is crucial you do. Anxiety plays a significant role on levels that contain entities such as the Porcelain Ghost and False Car. Another mechanics that will come to use is playing dead. Porcelain Ghost will ignore you when you play dead. Keep in mind if you do not play dead on time you will suffer the consequence. Shrimp is able to evolve and gain newer abilities progressing further into the game. These abilities will help you traverse levels efficiently. You will gain abilities as you move forward in the game. The Shrimp is equipped with a scanner so you will be able to scan around for cars. This scanner is upgradable if you want the scanner to detect other items or if you want to increase the radius. Other Things There is a lot this game offers beyond the surface level such as a detailed Index system. A currency converter to convert between different ones (All currencies are NOT microtransaction. There are NO microtransactions in the game rather these are currencies that you find in the game), an analyzation system, and tons of secrets left in the game left undiscovered. If you love exploring a game and getting lost in all the little things this game has a lot of that. These intricate systems do not need to be touched. If you choose to stay as a causal enjoyer that is fine, but if you want to see the depths of insanity of Shrimp's lore and what it has to offer it will be there for you.
Short Description: Play as a Shrimp and complete a ritual that had been abandoned in a world of abstract darkness. S H R i M P is a third person platformer based in a terrifying world with entities delivering a thrill you'll never forget.

Detailed Description: ADD FULL GAME TO YOUR WISHLIST About the Game We are developing this short experience into a new full game called Imagined Leviathans, which will greatly develop the gameplay and themes into a full 2-3 hours of play, with improved visuals and significantly more to do and see, including meeting other survivors “At fifty degrees below zero frostbite can strike in as few as five minutes” A poetic survival horror set in a future where climate change has rendered Britain an arctic wasteland. On your pilgrimage to Steel Henge you can only take what you can carry, so choose carefully what you leave behind. Immerse yourself in this starkly monochromatic world as you scavenge for fuel, take shelter in the shadows, and burn stories to stay warm. A malevolent presence lurks between the words, just out of reach. Alone, you must sacrifice everything you knew to deliver the bitter truth of this world to future generations. A brief but intense 20 minutes.

Detailed Description: Embark on an exhilarating journey in this solo racing indie game, uniquely crafted with physics-based flying, exclusively in VR. Navigate through checkpoints to reach the finish line, and here's the twist—pause the timer at any platform to savor the view and appreciate the scenery. So, rev up those engines and let the adventure begin! Just make sure you're not afraid of heights! Required: A SteamVR HMD and, HTC Controller or Valve Index Controller, or Meta Quests 3 and Meta Quest Controller
Short Description: Embark on a journey through the skies in this immersive physics-based flying game – exclusively designed for VR enthusiasts

Game Name: Christmas Fables: The Magic Snowflake Collector's Edition
Detailed Description: This game consists of the best mini-games and item search scenes from DominiGames! Santa's Toy Factory is on holiday overload (happens every year, get used to it). In an effort not to let his co-workers down, one of the elves has refused to take a sick day (elves getting colds, imagine that), and now there's a vexed 10-year-old kid walking the streets of the city with a very (very!) dangerous artifact in his tiny sweet hands. Now what do a common cold and an impending catastrophe have to do with each other, you may ask? That is something to be kept just between you and the aforementioned elf! Above all, please-please-please don't tell Santa! Gather your wits for an unforgettable story in this pulse-pounded new Hidden-Object Puzzle Adventure! This Collector's Edition includes: 🎄 Uncover hidden objects! Explore the enchanting nooks and crannies of Santa's bustling toy factory as you search for hidden objects and gather essential clues. Your sharp eye will be your greatest asset as you piece together the puzzle of saving Christmas! 🎄 Magic puzzles! Look for new items, solve confusing puzzles, find answers, castigate and open boxes and mystery chests. This will all help move you further along in the storyline and even unlock new Christmas trails. Be on the lookout! 🎄 Game-changing choices! It's not just about finding objects, it's about making critical decisions that will shape the destinies of those involved. Will you have the courage and wisdom to influence people's fates and bring back the joy of the holiday season? 🎄 Exclusive collections! This enchanting story is filled with various magical items and mysterious artifacts that you can get as you progress through the game. Hurry up and start playing to fully immerse yourself in the magical atmosphere!
Short Description: A magical snowflake of infinite power is lost, but not hope or holiday spirit! Save Christmas and rescue the dangerous artifact from the hands of a small troublemaker!

Detailed Description: Evolve is a cutting-edge benchmarking suite designed to push the limits of modern GPUs, we've implemented state of the art rendering techniques that are both seen in high-end games as well as techniques found more often in offline (movie) rendering while trying to bring them to real time. We hope to impress you with our graphics, while we're measuring all there is to know about your GPU! Evolve provides the ultimate toolkit for pushing your hardware to its limits: Comprehensive scoring : evaluate your overclocking prowess across multiple categories, including acceleration structure build performance, ray tracing / traversal, rasterization, compute, and more Detailed performance breakdown : gain deep insights into your system's performance with our frame-by-frame analysis On screen display: give you a breakdown of vital GPU statistics such as temperature, voltage and wattage during a benchmark run! Experience the future of gaming benchmarks: Next-gen graphics : assess your rig's capabilities with cutting-edge ray tracing and path tracing technologies Game-like workloads : EVOLVE focuses on delivering performance metrics that matter in real gaming scenarios, and has implemented techniques found in real games Online leaderboards : compare your scores against gamers worldwide and climb the ranks Dive deep into hardware performance with Evolve: Multiple rendering techniques : explore path tracing and hybrid rendering methods Energy consumption metrics : understand your system's power efficiency Driver overhead analysis : gain insights into how different drivers impact your system's performance Community engagement : join our Discord community to share results, tips, discuss hardware performance and overclocking techniques.
Short Description: Evolve is a cross-platform ray tracing benchmark for gamers, researchers, influencers, developers, and overclockers who want to get the most out of their hardware.
About the Game: Evolve is a cutting-edge benchmarking suite designed to push the limits of modern GPUs, we've implemented state of the art rendering techniques that are both seen in high-end games as well as techniques found more often in offline (movie) rendering while trying to bring them to real time. We hope to impress you with our graphics, while we're measuring all there is to know about your GPU! Evolve provides the ultimate toolkit for pushing your hardware to its limits: Comprehensive scoring : evaluate your overclocking prowess across multiple categories, including acceleration structure build performance, ray tracing / traversal, rasterization, compute, and more Detailed performance breakdown : gain deep insights into your system's performance with our frame-by-frame analysis On screen display: give you a breakdown of vital GPU statistics such as temperature, voltage and wattage during a benchmark run! Experience the future of gaming benchmarks: Next-gen graphics : assess your rig's capabilities with cutting-edge ray tracing and path tracing technologies Game-like workloads : EVOLVE focuses on delivering performance metrics that matter in real gaming scenarios, and has implemented techniques found in real games Online leaderboards : compare your scores against gamers worldwide and climb the ranks Dive deep into hardware performance with Evolve: Multiple rendering techniques : explore path tracing and hybrid rendering methods Energy consumption metrics : understand your system's power efficiency Driver overhead analysis : gain insights into how different drivers impact your system's performance Community engagement : join our Discord community to share results, tips, discuss hardware performance and overclocking techniques.

Detailed Description: Envelope is a psychological thriller game that puts you in the shoes of an unfortunate soul who finds himself getting pushed to do something beyond anything he could possibly imagine. Immersive gameplay and storytelling. Work your way through the night shift to explore an odd world full of strange people. The second part of the game has an open world for you to explore, and every choice you make could affect how the ending of the game plays out. FEATURES Multiple endings Freedom of choice Features a minimal indie chic graphic style Strange characters that may help you in your journey

Detailed Description: ■STORY A mysterious tower suddenly appeared near the town of Stadt. As the (self-claimed) Number One adventurer of the guild, Chris the Swordmaiden is eager to take up a challenge, meanwhile Anita the shy loner Mage somehow got herself dragged into Chris's quest. Can the duo conquer The Cursed Tower of Lust!? ※Both characters can be freely swapped from beginning, however they will not act together as a party. ■SYSTEM Game progress by card selection. Each card has their own event, such as Battle, Item, Trap, Abnormal Status, and more! Pick cards wisely according to your situation! ■BATTLE H! RESTRAINT! HUMILIATION! MOANS! In battle, monsters will attempt to break your armor/clothes and restrain you. Continuously taking restraining attacks and you will be unable to fight back, and get humiliated... There will be character voice for humiliation scenes! ■PLENTY OF BAD STATUSES!! Ranging from the basic 【Armor Break】 and 【Naked】, to more challenging 【Masochism】, 【Jinx】, 【Womb Crest】 etc. Many also affect your appearance such as 【Blindfold】, 【Gag】, 【Bukkake】, 【Lactation】, 【Swollen Clit】, 【Futanari】 etc etc... There are just tons and TONS of bad statuses to look for! ※There will be accessory to negate certain statuses, in case they make you feel uncomfortable. ■H TRAPS!! Within the Cursed Tower lies not only monsters but also traps!! Swallowed whole by a tentacle pot falling from the ceiling, restrained by countless mechanical arms, immobilized on all fours... And getting caught is never the end of it, for those tentacles and machines will take their chances on a disabled prey!! ■AND MANY OTHER H EVENTS! Letting a Merchant have his way with your body for a discount, watching reminiscences of other fallen adventurers, and many more!!

Detailed Description: 💕ONANIましょう👉👌 About the Game Monastery of Adelia Abbey, a group of exorcism experts known as the Battle Sister gather. One day, they receive a commission. The commission requests them to clear the emerging evil spirits in a cave, which has now become a mining site. The appearance of these evil spirits poses a threat to the kingdom's economic lifeline. Many miners have gathered there, urgently needing rescue. The one appointed for this task is the strongest battle sister, Leah. Leah is an exorcist who has been fighting evil spirits since childhood. She first arrives at the checkpoint near the cave entrance. There, temporary accommodation for miners and various facilities for preparing tools are set up. There is a natural hot spring, with male and female bath areas separated by only a curtain. In addition, there is a Brothel created to satisfy male needs, and more... Sister Leah, a devout sister dedicated to exorcism, whose life takes a sinful turn with lustful! This is a simple adult RPG based on exploring bases and dungeons. In the dungeon, there is no combat; you only need to chant magic to defeat enemies. However, in the cave, due to the influence of evil spirits, the air is filled with pheromone gas, and as you progress, the erotic becomes easier to increase. As the erotic increases, the consumption of magic points will sharply increase. (To make you defeat, super lusty poisonous swamps are placed throughout.) Use the skill to exorcise evil spirits with one blow. Erotic status - undergoes obvious changes with each H event! Change outfits obtained in the equipment screen, influencing character illustrations.
Short Description: The strongest battle sister, Leah, sent by the church to the haunted cave occupied by evil spirits! Within the dungeon, numerous lewd events await Leah. Will she be able to save the miners without violating the divine commandments?

Detailed Description: Astro Hunters VR is a PvPvE extraction shooter set in space. Immerse yourself in the exploration of a unique planet, fight with different enemies, craft, gather resources, and upgrade your weapons. But remember, there are also other hunters on the planet. Will you ally, fight, or betray - it's up to you! Become one of the mercenaries called Hunters and help the Mothership achieve its objectives on the hostile planets. Undertake dangerous missions and challenge other players and in exchange freely scavenge the planets. You can join forces with other players, but be careful, hunting down other players to seize their valuable equipment is also an option! Going on an expedition comes with a high reward if you find valuable items, but it’s also high risk - if you die, you lose everything you have with you! Collect resources such as gases, liquids, metals, and others. Each of the resources has its special gathering tool . Use the collected items to craft new and better equipment. The Mothership provides you with crafting stations , on which you can craft inhalers, weapon parts, ammo and more. Do you want to store them, sell for good money, or trade with other players? The choice is yours! Gather a diverse range of weapons : pistols, rifles, rocket launchers, machine guns, shotguns, and snipers. Upgrade stats and customize them with elemental modifications : fire, plasma, electricity, and acid. Beware of other players lurking on the planets for your loot. To avoid being left with nothing, store some of them in your storage room to be ready for your next expedition. Take up the challenge and fight for the loot on the uncharted territories of a unique planet , brimming with diverse landscapes, challenging terrains, and protected bases full of precious items. Discover a wealth of resources, hunt, and engage in an intense fight against a multitude of enemies each presenting distinct challenges. Become one of the Hunters, and be the best!

Game Name: Duck Detective: The Ghost of Glamping
Detailed Description: The Duck Detective is back! Get ready to interview suspects, inspect evidence, and deduce the truth in another stand-alone mystery! This campsite might have ghosts, but the real thing haunting Eugene McQuacklin is his failed marriage and bread addiction. Can he escape the shadows of his past? To the annoyance of the Duck Detective, he is joined by a new partner in (solving) crime. Work together to unravel the truth and nibble on the crumbs of justice! A 2-3 hour long cozy mystery game! A stand-alone sequel to the acclaimed ‘Duck Detective: The Secret Salami!‘ Interview suspects, fill in the blanks and crack the case! Fully voice-acted cast of suspiciously secretive characters! Dive into a murky pond of delinquency and dredge up the truth! Throw bread to the fine beak of lady justice!
Short Description: When spookiness strikes a luxury campsite, the one and only Duck Detective is summoned to quack the case. Inspect evidence, make de-duck-tions, and solve this no-murder mystery!

Detailed Description: In this gym run by old Martín, former professional boxer, he will be the one who trains you to get the best out of you, you will test your agility, reflexes, concentration, coordination, patience, perseverance... in the three types of training it offers Until now the gym, he trains with the punching bag, the speed bag and the boxing ball. Improve your stats such as your strength, critical blows, aiming, defense and dodge blows to see them in action above the ring in each sparring match. Your gym mates will always give you good advice to lift your spirits and improve as a boxer, even though they are very rude in practice (sparring against the CPU). Notes from old Martin: Each boxer must complete rigorous training to get into the ring: Train with the punching bag to improve your strength and your critical blows. Train with the speed bag to improve your aiming and your defense. Train with the boxing ball to improve your dodge blows. Each training increases your energy and lowers your fatigue to improve your health recovery in sparring, improve your recovery after receiving a KO, improve your breathing to launch consecutive blows. If you want to face someone in sparring you need to train with the punching bag, the speed bag and the boxing ball to achieve at least: 15% of your strength on average. 25% of your aiming on average. 5% of your dodge blows on average. Despite the protections and rules of sparring... not being properly prepared would be dangerous and you wouldn't last a round. If you train hard, exceeding the minimum of your statistics to get into the ring, you will be more aware of your physical condition and that of your rival in sparring: 22.5% of your strength, 37.5% of your aiming and 7.5% of your dodge blows on average to display your health in combat. 30% of your strength, 50% of your aiming and 10% of your dodge blows on average to visualize your opponent's health and fatigue in combat. Try to get 100% of your potential and fill your fight history with victories.
Short Description: GymFistprint is a boxing gym where we train hard to measure our skills with people from all over the world, do old Martín's training, test your limits and get your maximum potential.

Detailed Description: You are a respected gastroenterologist at the height of your profession. You have seen it all and treated it all. There is nothing you cannot handle. You do not know it yet but this is your final week. Gameplay You will spend your time deep in the claustrophobic colons of your patients. You will have to identify and treat any and all ailments you discover in order to ensure the future health of your patients. You will have access to a range of specialized medical instruments to aid you in this task. Story Driven The game is played in five chapters. Each chapter focuses on treating the ailments of a different patient. The week starts off normally but as the week progresses you encounter the things of a gastroenterologist's nightmares. Multiple Endings How you play the game makes a difference to the ending of each chapter and to the ending of the game as a whole. Body Horror It is not just about generic blood and guts. Each chapter of the game focuses on different aspects of body horror so that players will have something different to encounter with every patient. Visual Style We chose the retro PS1 style because we know it is much enjoyed by fans of the indie horror genre. The crudeness of the visual style combined with the game's subject matter helps to create an atmosphere of nostalgic unease.
Short Description: Revenge of the colon is a story driven, single-player, atmospheric, body horror game with multiple endings. Perform colonoscopies on five patients and discover the horrors concealed deep within them. PS1 horror style!

Game Name: Dungeon Vixens: A Tale of Temptation
Detailed Description: Inspired by Monster Girl's Labyrinth, Dungeon Vixens is a dungeon crawling rouge-like monster girl adventure with retro graphics. You play as a lone protagonist with a quest to reclaim his love. The dungeon he is about to enter however is filled with a lot of temptations and challenges. Such as the Succubus Lilura and many other sexy vixens that roam the halls. Using your attack and defense slider system timing is everything. Detailed Description: JOIN OUR DISCORD About the Game Explore a vast procedurally generated world in this survival sandbox adventure for 1-4 players. Gather resources, build shelters, tend your farm, recruit NPC's, craft items or take on high risk dungeon crawling as you delve into the unknown. Be warned: Only the most courageous hero can uncover the secrets to Delverium. Could this be you? CRAFT AND BUILD Unlock and craft a huge array of items including food, tools, weapons, armor and building materials. Build shelters for safety and recruit NPC's who provide valuable trading options. Enjoy many quality of life features like nested crafting and an expandable player inventory. TEND YOUR FARM Till the soil, plant seeds, water your crops and watch your farm grow. Breed animals, catch fish and gather wild ingredients to combine with your harvest in a wide range of cooking recipes to eat and trade. DELVE DEEP Discover exotic biomes, hidden caves and dangerous dungeons that abound the land. Explore far and wide to mine ores, collect rare materials, unearth lost treasures, defeat foes and loot unique items. UNCOVER THE HIDDEN TRUTH There is a great peril infecting the land and you are the only hero who can restore stability. Uncover lost fragments of lore and hunt down the 'Faults' to piece together the hidden truth of Delverium. PLAY YOUR WAY Be it casual farming, settlement building, exploring the unknown or delving into dangerous dungeons; Play how you like and enjoy Delverium either solo or with up to 3 friends in split screen and online multiplayer.

Detailed Description: Take on the role of the A17 robot and you will discover the extraordinary secrets of a forgotten city. Build vehicles to reach the most distant, long-deserted places. Face numerous challenges, solve various puzzles and earn the most valuable rewards far beyond the borders of the safe district. Explore the extraordinary city, traversing the rooftops and ruins of buildings, discovering the secrets of a bygone world. Take on the role of a wanderer, make friends and defeat enemies to reach the furthest districts of the metropolis. Venture deeper and deeper, taking the risk of a path of no return and valuable rewards! Build machines to travel, fight and collect resources that make you the ultimate constructor. Express yourself with colors and paints. Upgrade your vehicles and conquer new territories by creating a perfect combat machine. Improve your vehicles with additional upgrades and gain new abilities! Experiment with the acquired raw materials and parts to make the most of their potential. Discover the engineer within you by combining logical principles to obtain new effects of your machine. Create new more efficient vehicles with more parts. Take risks to survive. Search, discover, conquer!
Short Description: Mechanical Lab is a 2D action game focused on the physical interaction of machines with the environment. Explore, build and experiment to survive in the city of robots long after the end of human civilization.

Detailed Description: Canyons is a cooperative PvE game set in a procedurally generated post-apocalyptic world where survival is only possible in the canyons. Play solo or gather a team of up to four players. Arm yourselves to the teeth, grab supplies, and set out to conquer the canyons on massive Crawlers. CRAWLERS The vast waters disappeared hundreds of years ago, but the spirit of the pioneer ancestors and their inventions remain timeless. Become the captain of a Crawler—a colossal machine from the past, essential for traversing the canyons. Modify, upgrade, and develop your steel companion! Unless, of course, you find a better friend—here, sentimentality has no place. EXPEDITIONS Welcome to a world teeming with dangers, endless storms, scorching sun, fearsome creatures, and humans steeped in cruelty. You’re very welcome here, especially if you're tasty. Gather loyal friends, load ammo onto your rusty Crawler, and embark on expeditions to conquer, save, build, or destroy these damned canyons. Will you risk everything for legendary rewards, or will you wisely return home when things get tough? The choice is yours. There are no right decisions or proven paths here, but there is a complex procedural generation system with hand-crafted details and unique events that will let you feel the crunch of sand under your scurvy-ridden teeth over and over again. HAVEN No matter how brave a warrior you are, one day you'll have to return home. Establish your settlement in the canyon caves, equip it with everything survivors need, and they will gladly settle there. Build a shipyard for Crawler construction, garages for repair and tuning, an armory, or a fancy cafeteria with zombie burgers. Create infrastructure for traders, medics, workers, and more! And of course, ensure the protection of your home haven, as there will always be those who covet what you have. CAPTAIN Shooting is good, but shooting well is even better, and to achieve this, you must develop your captain. Besides improving basic stats, you can master dozens of professions, each enhancing your character in some aspect of the game. While shooting bottles and lifting weights, don’t forget about morality. The canyons are a harsh place, often forcing difficult choices. How will you treat a survivor dying of thirst? Give them precious water, take them to your harbor, rob them, leave them to the monsters, or even eat them yourself? The decision is yours! But remember, everything has consequences. INHABITANTS No matter how crazy an idea seems, it will always gather a group of followers. The canyons are no exception. The crowd here is peculiar. Lawmen, Marauders, the Diesel Cult, and many others await you on their lands. Or don’t—they might react uniquely to your actions and morality score. Find common ground with them, and they will aid you. For example, the Lawmen can provide the best equipment, the Diesel Cult can grant access to the finest transport and Crawler modules, and the Sun Fanatics will simply blow your head off—they are hated by everyone, and the feeling is mutual. Of course, humans are not the only inhabitants of these lands. In the canyons, you will encounter Shrivelled, Creepers, Savages, and many other creatures that mothers use to scare misbehaving children.

Detailed Description: ESCAPE FROM BOYKISSER is a psychological horror game that immerses the player in the sterile rooms of BACKROOMS. Key Features: Unique Setting: Immerse yourself in an atmosphere where time seems to stand still, and people lose themselves both in space and within their own minds. Formidable Opponent: On your journey, you will encounter the mysterious inhabitant of these places, known as BOYKISSER . He already senses your presence and roams his lair in search of prey. Will you be able to avoid his gaze? Grim Journey: As you wander and gather pieces of the puzzle, you will learn all the secrets of this strange place and may even come closer to solving them.

Detailed Description: Welcome to the one and only Heptic Arena. The only show worth watching! Become a contender in the illustrious Arena and participate in the only blood sport televised across the known universe. Each episode will pit you and your friends not only against other contenders, but the whims of the organizers as well. Explore, upgrade your arsenal, shoot opponents, shoot your friends – do whatever it takes to become the champion of Heptic Arena! A CLASH OF WORLDS Built to mimic the home environments of the contenders, The Arena features four unique biomes – each with its own boons, challenges and hyper-aggressive fauna. Team up or brave the wilds alone, but know there are scarier things than players hiding in The Arena. CHOOSE YOUR PATH Select one of the many galactic species participating in the Arena, each allowing for a different approach to combat with their unique skill sets. Shape your characters your way with branching skill trees, active skills and unique passive bonuses to keep your enemies guessing. MOVE IT OR LOSE IT Zoom around the battlefield using a momentum-based movement system, opening up new opportunities and pathways around both the map and your foes. Learn the ropes, discover pathways and show your mastery of the Arena. KILL OR BE KILLED Kill and steal your way into the hearts of millions. Each kill earns favor with the audience that can be spent to purchase new weapons, upgrades and other goodies tailored to help you do what you do best – sow chaos. Add Heptic Arena to your wishlist today! Dive into early access on Steam and be part of the next big thing in competitive team shooters. The Arena beckons — will you answer the call?
