Detailed Description: 🧭 Orienteering Simulator 🧭 Version: v.1.1 Martinsflue (Release) 🔰 - Learn how to orientate yourself in this friendly environment. In Find-Posts-Mode, you will have to find your target using a compass and a map, while in Orienteering-Mode, you have to pinpoint your location on the map. 🔓 Choose between multiple maps, gamemodes, weather conditions more to create your personalized experience. Fulfill achievements to unlock new compasses that you can use during your explorations. ⬆️Update! Check out the new map Martinsflue! Orientate in a harsh environment containing lots of height difference, stones and winding paths. Want even more fun? Try out the Martinsflue-Extra-Map's Stones-Only, Contour-Lines-Only or Paths-Only!

Detailed Description: Night Nite is a horror comedy adventure game set in modern times. ◆ Story One day, after finishing your errands and returning home, you encounter inexplicable events. It's a phenomenon resembling unseen ghosts, and you find yourself troubled by it. You spend your days in anguish, wondering what it could be. ◆ Game Features ・A walking simulator where various events unfold as you walk. ・Advance the story by examining objects. ・No quest markers or time limits, allowing for a relaxed gameplay experience. ・Simply wander through a persistently dark screen. Playtime: 15 minutes to 30 minutes ◆Video Streaming Guidelines ・Regardless of whether you are an individual or a business entity, streaming is allowed without the need for permission.

Detailed Description: Attacker, coward, swindler or endgame wizard: I'll show you how to win against anyone! After my World Championship victories in 2022 and 2023, I am the reigning Chess Software World Champion and am now looking forward to showing you how to become even stronger against your opponent With my innovative training method, I simulate typical player personalities you know from tournaments and online chess: brash attackers, cautious cowards, passive players. But how do you win against them? Fritz will show you how! And for beautiful attacks, combinations or sacrifices, there are the new ChessBase cards as a reward for you. Practical training that's also a lot of fun. Or let's train openings: you can try out a new repertoire ideas directly in a match against me. And how about the new calculation training for a quick Elo boost? As Fritz19 I can make you play better again. Fritz 18 marked the beginning of a new era, and Fritz 19 drives this development onward: a game against Fritz should be more than just a game - it should be an experience. In a time when online chess dominates, a chess program has to offer something special to be a real alternative to human opponents. In Fritz 19 it works like this There are six different characters that mimic typical club players: Allrounder, Aggressive, Positional, Swindler, Fearful, Endgame Expert. Fritz plays human moves that fit these types, but builds-in tactical mistakes so that you can win with a sacricial attack, for example. The sharper the position, the more likely the program will misstep. There is a wide range of tips and support that you can use to the full, or ignore, depending on your mood. With all the tips, you will practically always win against the “strong club player” level. If you ignore them completely, it becomes challenging for a player like me (ELO 2000). At any time during the game, you can switch to “assisted calculation” mode. Where is no clock, so you can train your calculation without stress in positions you have played yourself. This has an enormous training benefit. The opponent zoo The character Allrounder is probably the strongest opponent for every level of play. It is a development of “Easy Game” from Fritz 18. Everyone knows the Aggressive Player from their club. They regularly play on the attack, with a sharp opening repertoire. They are the ideal opponent for defence training with Black. The Swindler takes aggressiveness to the extreme, and o!en overplays the position. Material and solid position are of no interest, the main thing is to go for the king. Against this swindling fox, one usually has a material advantage, but suddenly it becomes highly dangerous. The wise owl symbolises the Positional Player. It loves a good pawn structure, a secure king of its own and coordinated piece-play. The distorted echo of this, is the fearful mouse. It appreciates crowded, safe positions and is afraid of complications. That is why it often plays weaker. The Endgame Fan, on the other hand, plays specifically for exchange. Simplification is paramount, the opening is o!en unambitious. When it comes to the endgame, on the other hand, things get really tough. An effective training opponent for this phase of the game! New opening training We all manage our opening repertoire in variation trees, stored in databases. If you want to play against it, it gets technical: opening books have to be converted. On today’s powerful computers, this has become obsolete. In Fritz 19, you play directly against databases, your own repertoire, or an opening article from the ChessBase Magazine! If the White player, the Black player, the tournament title, or the source begins with “White” or “Black”, then all the moves in this game belong to this colour. Fritz will then only play these moves. A repertoire is always rather narrow from the point of view of one’s own colour and broad for the opponent’s moves. Try it out: Your Najdorf repertoire with Black against the “aggressive” player! Tip for ChessBase users: Save a generated opening survey from ChessBase and play against it immediately What else is available The new engine in Fritz 19 is the Computer Chess World Champion for 2023. The Calculation Training has been extended, especially in the important preliminary query of candidate moves. The Buddy Engine and the annotated engine analysis from ChessBase 17 have found their way into Fritz. The notation (and the whole program interface) has been enormously enhanced in places. Tactical Analysis, the important full commentary of your games, has been improved and much more!

Detailed Description: Aviators VR builds on the foundation of Aviators, delivering an expanded gaming adventure. The experience is divided into two parts - arcade and educational . The arcade portion gives players a chance to control the upper turret gun of a Handley Page Halifax bomber to fend off attacks from German fighter planes. This highly realistic and immersive segment allows players to interact with the Boulton-Paul Type C Mk. II’s electro-hydraulic mechanism. The educational section lets players explore a virtual hangar of the Polish air wing at one of the British bases. Here, players can experience a guided audio tour, which walks them through the exhibits, such as the Handley Page Halifax bomber and the legendary Spitfire MK.VB manned by Jan Zumbach, while providing historical context for the arcade segment.
Short Description: A concise VR experience inspired by the game Aviators. Take control of the upper turret gun on a bomber and fend off attacks from German fighters. Visit a virtual hangar of the Polish air wing and learn more about the events depicted in the game.

Detailed Description: 🃏 Unique Roguelike Deckbuilding Strategy Single-play Role-playing Card Game In Lost Pages, play with an entirely new and unique original deckbuilding system. The elemental deckbuilding system we've devised doesn't involve random card draws but instead requires a random draw of resources (elements of fire, water, earth, air) to use spells. This novel approach was recognized for its originality at the Google Indie Game Festival, offering a completely new deckbuilding experience. 🌈 Ether Element System Going beyond just drawing elements, a distinctive element called Ether makes the game even more rich. The nature of the Ether element is determined at the moment it is drawn, and it always triggers a draw of another element, potentially leading to a chain draw. 🏒 Overwhelming Variation and Freedom Lost Pages boasts an incredible number of various magic circles, artifacts, and runes. Depending on the user's choices, the deck changes freely. Such variation and freedom keep the gameplay constantly engaging, combined with the user's growing stats, offering unimaginably diverse experiences. ⚔️ 106 Levels for Endless Challenges Clearing just the six basic levels is a significant challenge, but the 100 levels of the Dimensional Gate mode remain as a goal for players to strive for, even years after release. 🎬 Unique Story and Beautiful Animation Lost Pages is the first installment in a series, grounded in a profound universe centered around the birth of the moon. Currently, it includes eight original animations, with more captivating story animations continuously being added. 🤓 Official Discord: 🤓 Contact Email: lostpages@jiffycrew.com 🤓 Privacy Policy: 🤓 Terms of Use:

Detailed Description: Whirlight – No Time To Trip, an extraordinary point-and-click graphic adventure that redefines the boundaries of the imagination. Hector is weird. His brilliance is matched only by his misfortune, and so his every creation turns out to be a failure. But just when his creative streak seems to have run out, his most amazing idea ever knocks on his door. To finish his new invention, Hector will have to explore the suggestive Verice Bay. However, right on the verge of achieving his goal, more trouble arises: what was supposed to be the solution to all his problems turns out to be a leap into the unknown. Fortunately this leads him to meeting Margaret, a strong and determined artist and a perfect travelling companion. Together they will embark on a series of adventures through space and time, amidst bizarre characters and unlikely situations, until they foil an imminent threat that looms over the entire world. This epic journey takes place in a universe where humor, fantasy and time travel come together with breathtaking hand-drawn graphics. The game's fun, cartoony atmosphere is reminiscent of classics like Day of the Tentacle and Sam Max Hit the Road, immersing you in a feat of color, bizarre situations and hilarious dialogue. A must-play experience for lovers of graphic adventures and for anyone who enjoys unique and unforgettable gaming experiences!

Detailed Description: Time Glitch invites you to immerse yourself in a short, unique blend of dungeon crawling and time manipulation. You find yourself at the end of a grand tabletop campaign, facing an undead king who wields the power of time itself. However, every defeat sends you back to the gates of the final dungeon, where your experience began. But here's the twist – you retain your memories, particularly knowing which die yields what number. Armed with this information, guide your characters strategically through the final battle. Role dice to cast spells and launch attacks, but be cautious – the world's fate hangs in the balance, and so does the friendship among your party. Key Features: Strategic Dice Rolls: Remember the outcomes of your dice rolls to make crucial decisions. Your success hinges on choosing the correct paths and actions to overcome challenges. The game is designed to be completed in roughly 20 minutes, offering an engaging experience that fits into a short gaming session or 1 hour if you want to get all the endings. Bite-sized tabletop RPG Journey: Immerse yourself in the final moments of a tabletop RPG, complete with an undead king who controls the very fabric of time. 4th Wall Breaking Fun: Delight in the unique experience of playing a bite-sized tabletop RPG journey within a game. Enjoy the subtle humor and surprises as you navigate the game world and the meta-narrative. Friendship and Fate: Every decision matters not only for the fate of the in-game world but also for the bonds between your characters. Can you break the cycle, defeat the undead king, and ensure a triumphant end to your campaign? Explore the intricate blend of time travel and tabletop RPG in Time Glitch – where the past is your greatest weapon.

Detailed Description: Nonogram 3D: Mega puzzle is a logic game where the goal is to uncover the hidden shape in each puzzle. To assist you, color hints will indicate the number of cubes to paint in each row. It's up to you to deduce which color to paint them, or whether to destroy them. Inspired by nonograms (or picross), this 3D variant adds depth to the game while remaining accessible. Features 200+ handcrafted puzzles. A procedural puzzle generator. Comprehensive tutorials to guide you. Two-color puzzles. No randomness, only deduction. Puzzles grouped by categories and sorted by increasing difficulty.
Short Description: Nonogram 3D: Mega puzzle is a logic and puzzle-solving game. Analyze the hints, then break and paint the puzzles to reveal hidden shapes. Inspired by nonograms (or picross), this 3D variant adds depth to the game while remaining accessible.

Players can recruit new soldiers through the recruitment hall and train them in the barracks. Develop agriculture and market to increase the income of the area under your jurisdiction. Detailed Description: Step into the haunting realm of Bobo's Funzone, in this horror/puzzle adventure. Your mission: find your daughter, who was attending a birthday party here. Navigate the eerie corridors, unearth what happend, and be careful and cautious as Bobo is about. Navigate Bobo's Funzone a kids entertainment centre as you look for your child Roam through the dimly lit corridors of Bobo's Funzone, a once joyful place now filled with shadows and ominous echoes. Your mission is clear: find your child amidst the unsettling atmosphere, where each corner may hold a terrifying surprise. Solve Puzzles With Found Objects Uncover hidden objects and tools scattered throughout the Funzone to aid your quest. Solve intricate puzzles that stand between you and the safety of your child. Explore the mystery of what happened here Delve into the disturbing history of Bobo's Funzone as you unearth clues that hint at the sinister events that unfolded within its walls. What dark secrets led this once joyful place to become a nightmare? The answers lie in the shadows, waiting to be uncovered. Be careful, you're not alone – Bobo is about Beware of Bobo, he lurks in the darkest corners of the entertainment center. As you navigate the haunted halls, keep a watchful eye, for Bobo is not just a figment of your imagination. Survival depends on your ability to outsmart and escape the clutches of him. Will you be able to escape the funzone with your daughter?

Detailed Description: Synopsis: Isabella: Chasing Shadows is an adult visual novel story crafted as an erotic thriller, where your choices will matter, as you find yourself deeply entrenched in trying to uncover those responsible for the murder of your fiancée. Story: Life with your fiancée, who was a dedicated reporter, comes to a bitter end when a tragic hit-and-run claims her life. Despite the police closing the case as a mere accident, you are haunted by the lingering suspicion of murder that they've failed to investigate. Determined to unveil the truth, you’ll embark on a relentless pursuit for justice, using your skills and enlisting the help of both old and new allies in your quest. As you delve ever deeper into the city’s dark underbelly, you’ll encounter a captivating supermodel; you’ll rely on an old friend wielding incredible resources and on a network of shadowy figures. Will you be able to uncover the dark secrets of the city you once loved? And the most important question is: Will you seek justice for your lost love… or… will you succumb to the allure of revenge? Gameplay This is a game where your choices matter! Every decision you make will affect how the game proceeds and how people will behave towards you. And, in the end, those choices will determine if you choose the path of JUSTICE or one of REVENGE. These choices also include the relationships you’ll have, such as: Alex, your naughty ‘Friend with benefits’, or maybe you’ll choose a solo path with Isabella, a ‘world class model’ who needs your help… or, perhaps you’ll have a relationship with both… the choice is yours in this story driven game where your choices really do matter. Main Characters The MC (you) – The Problem Solver Answer Seeker Surviving from a rough childhood and getting training in the military, you’ve made for yourself quite a fortune with software development. Things were perfect for you… an exciting career, money and a fiancée that you loved and were going to marry. You lost yourself the day she died, you shrugged of the care and concern that your loved ones sent your way; but one person was able to pull you from the prison of solitude you’d locked yourself behind, Alex… Alexandria “Alex” – A Sassy but Cute Troublemaker Not everything is as it seems with the woman who’s stood beside you and nursed you back into the world after the death of your fiancée… She carries with her a troubling and checkered past that you’ll begin to uncover. Will you continue to stand beside and count on her as you learn more about her, or will your focus travel elsewhere? Isabella “Isa” – Supermodel of the Year Confident and beautiful, but also in trouble! Not happy with her current management, Isa seeks to break ties and start anew, but those who hold her contract aren’t willing to release her and will stop at nothing to make sure she doesn’t leave. Will you be able to help her from the mess that she's entangled in, or will you leave her fend for herself against shady men and stalkers? Side Characters: Valerie “Val” – News Reporter Your fiancée’s old co-worker, who has an interest in helping to uncover the truth if it is to be found and has an interest in you as well. William “Wil” – Ex-Military Ex-Cop There is more than meets the eye with Wil, particularly when it comes to the things he knows. Just who is this man and just what kind of connections does he have? Trisha “Trish” – Detective Niece of ‘Wil’ and a possible connection to getting the answers you need from a corrupt police department. Annoushka – Ex-Fashion Model Fearing for her life, what connection can this young woman have to everything that has happened? Nicolai – The Devil We Know Sometimes to kill a snake it takes a BIGGER snake… and, at least, you know where you stand with this one. But… at what cost? Matteo – Isa’s Uncle Responsible for getting Isabella into modelling, but what is in it for him… why do you get a bad vibe with this guy? The Coopers – Senior Junior The Main Antagonists and it feels like they own the entire city… just how far does their reach extend? For what purpose? And does it have anything to do with the death of your fiancée?
Short Description: Isabella - Chasing Shadows is an erotic thriller with adult elements. After the death of your fiancée, you’ll try to uncover the city’s darkest secrets. What connection does a ‘High Fashion’ model have to your fiancée’s death and can you protect those you care about? It’s up to you!

Detailed Description: Collect a 3D puzzle, transferring things to the right places to create a beautiful place. The game is a 3D puzzle, the player needs to put in place the missing pieces of the puzzle (items) scattered around the location. To create an entire location. You need to go to the item, take it by pressing the left mouse button and take the item to the desired location marked in green. If you brought the correct item, it will snap into place and you will receive leaderboard points and achievements for this. Collect as much items as possible as quickly as possible to get more points for the leaderboard. If you brought the wrong item, you can throw it away, it will return to the starting location so that you can pick it up again.

Detailed Description: Hidden-object adventure game. The player needs to run around the location and look for objects in secret places, climbing into them along walls and ledges. The player controls the girl using the Wasd keys and the mouse. And jumps around the location. When falling from a height, the player's health will be taken away; when it runs out, the player will die and will have to start the passage again. The game has achievements and a leaderboard.

Game Name: Cthulhu Mythos ADV The Isle Of Ubohoth
Detailed Description: Just Updated We’ve added new gameplay features and convenient functions in this Complete Edition Update! ・Cryptic Notes ・Enhanced Visual Effects The features below are also added, experience an enhanced and more engaging version of The Isle of Ubohoth—we hope you enjoy it! ・Harasho’s Journal ・Puzzles ・Success Rate Control ・Various Other Improvements Additional Feature Update! The following functions have been added in response to many requests. ▼ Skip Function(Function changed from fast forward to skip) ▼ Ending List About the Game On a mysterious island in the Seto Inland Sea, an urban legend tells that completing the 88 Temples Pilgrimage will summon Kukai, who will grant your wish. Our protagonist, visiting this island, is suddenly cursed by an unknown entity, putting their life in jeopardy. Can they prevent the resurrection of an ancient evil god sealed on the island and break the curse? ・Player Stats and Appearance Customization Answer questions to shape your protagonist’s stats. Enjoy thrilling dice rolls with challenging stats, and for an added layer of immersion, you can even replace the protagonist’s image. ・Dice Roll Choices In critical moments, the outcome of choices is determined by dice rolls. The success rate depends on the abilities of the protagonist and their companions. Sometimes, you will face scenes where you must succeed within a time limit! ・Explore the Map Search for clues to break the curse as you travel around the island. Keep an eye on your hunger level—it decreases with each move and can impact your dice rolls. ・Solve Mysteries Unravel cryptic notes and solve puzzles to uncover the island’s hidden truths. Hatsumi Amasawa CV:Mayu Mineda A friend of the protagonist and a university student. Cheerful and friendly with everyone, likely due to her good upbringing. Has a fondness for occult content like horror and urban legends. Reiji Kaga CV:Haruki Ishiya A friend of the protagonist and a university student. Although he excels academically, he postpones job hunting to focus on his hobbies and part-time jobs. While his interests in horse racing and pachinko haven't yielded great results, his excellent memory and insight make him unbeatable at mahjong. Hotaru Natsunagi CV:Yuki Tanaka A girl living on the island. Due to her frail health, she's never left the island and yearns for city life. After an unexpected encounter with the protagonist, the wheel of fate for both her and the island begins to turn. Yukitsune Saeki CV:Yuya Hirose A young man living on the island. Possesses mysterious powers and spends his days helping others. Claims the protagonist is his destined person, but his true intentions remain unclear. Keiyū Natsunagi CV:Hidenobu Kiuchi Hotaru’s father. How to Change the Protagonist's Image Steps to Update Player Image 1. Open the game's page on Steam. 2. Ensure the game is installed. 3. Click the gear icon on the right side of the screen and select Manage, then Browse Local Files. This will open the folder containing the game's files. 4. Place the images in the Jukashima_Data/StreamingAssets/player folder. Ensure the images adhere to the specified size and file naming conventions to be displayed correctly in the game. Image Specifications Size: 1920x1080 pixels File Format: PNG with a transparent background Number of Images: 11 (for different facial expressions) File Names: ・tsujo.png ・odoroki.png ・kyouki.png ・hohoemi.png ・egao.png ・aseri.png ・hensou.png ・hensou_aseri.png ・ikari.png ・kanashimi.png ・fushin.png Note: hensou is displayed during undercover investigations. Enjoy preparing your favorite disguise illustrations. For the Mac version, right-click on Jukashima.app and select Show Package Contents. Then, place the images in Contents/Resources/Data/StreamingAssets/player. Japanese, English

Detailed Description: Want to learn Japanese but don’t know where to start? Tried many learning methods, but none kept you motivated? Struggling to apply what you're learning in real life? Wagotabi is a fun and immersive RPG adventure set in real Japan. Fully accessible to beginners, it focuses on teaching the most practical words and grammatical concepts first, in concrete situations: asking for directions, ordering a Bento, expressing your likes and dislikes, and much more! Hiragana, Katakana, and Kanji are introduced progressively as you expand your vocabulary. Wagotabi is the game we wish we had when we first started learning Japanese. This game is recommended for people who: want to learn Japanese but don't know where to start have been struggling with conventional learning material want to prepare for a trip in Japan are interested in Japanese culture cannot go to Japan but want to apply their Japanese skills in real life situations FEATURES Role play in Japan Personalize your appearance, explore Japan and talk in Japanese with locals! Use your Japanese skills to progress in the adventure by solving quests, situations, and language-driven puzzles. All the situations have been handcrafting with care to maximize the practical use of the vocabulary and grammar concepts introduced. Discover the Japanese history, culture and geography while progressing in the adventure. Smart Tests Built in SRS (Spaced Repetition System) enables you to focus on words you struggle remembering. More than 15 different questions types are included (build sentences, find the correct words, conjugation, audio related questions, etc.) Mini games Diverse mini games for you to learn and have fun! Learning Kana and Kanji has never been that easy! Smart dictionary Review what you need the most, anytime in 360 degrees. Icons, tags, grammatical formations and example sentences help you remember each word! Fill your Kanjidex Become a Kanji collector. Crack them! (Non-exhaustive) list of other features Interactive dictionary (with illustrations, tags, example sentences etc.) Clear grammar explanation (with example sentences) Conjugation Interactive tooltips Fully voiced in Japanese Interactions with environment Quests Minigames (Kana and Kanji) Boss fights Hiragana / Katakana / Kanji stroke order and calligraphy Kanjidex Resembling Kanji Achievements Secrets Advanced progress tracking tools … STATISTICS (as of now) +210 carefully selected words and grammar points +110 Kanji +270 example sentences +800 voiced Japanese dialogues +200 unique NPCs in game +300 teachers in +60 countries reviewing the game All words are used in context for better retention PLAYER FEEDBACK You guys are a blessing to bring this to the learning market! I have been using some of the App's examples for my lessons and my students are responding to them really well. I don't have the budget to travel to Japan, however I'm totally immersed in this game, learning effectively and witnessing my progress daily. Thanks to this app, my kids are now self-motivated to learn Japanese and reconnect with their roots.“ I'm preparing a trip to Japan and will definitely go check these spots I already visited in-game.

Detailed Description: In this parody of popular streamers! Play as your favorite content creators like Mokipane, Asmondsilver and CQX. Form a cult! Squeeze your pay piggies, start drama, appease chat and rake in the dough. Earn bitties by performing actions for chat, collect the fallen bits using various stream upgrades that multiply their values. Use the money earned to buy upgrades for stream, random temporary upgrades that boosts every drop of money from your following, Buy different streamers and play minigames! What can you expect from this game: Over 5 iconic parodies of popular streamers and celebrities, each with their own sound clips and actions. Multiple upgrades that help boost income. Different themes for your stream overlay. Achievements. Skill Tree Prestige Radio feature with copyright free Lo-Fi beats.

Detailed Description: Massive, multiplayer, online, role-playing game in an open world. After choosing a character, go on an adventure. Mine and manufacture resources. Produce materials, engines, weapons and ammo. Explore the world using airships and aircraft. To move quickly, use strekolets or jump through the Gate. Live in the cities of the world or build your own settlement. Open up new possibilities by developing your character's skills. The fate of the world is in your hands! Many years ago, the Guardians left the world of the Edge of the Inside Out, leaving behind grains of magic, rare objects, and artifacts. The Bastions continue to control the territories. Flocks of dragons burn caravans and settlements caught on their path of fiery migration. The Outcasts seize border towns, shaking the fragile truce between the Empire and the Union. Minions are searching for particles of the Inside Out, bringing the world closer to the apocalypse. Character The race you choose affects where you first appear in the world - in the game, geography means a lot! Player grows their abilities by learning skills. Travel This is a game about adventures in the air — using ships, airships, or strekolets. The world is open and without restriction. Instant travel from one point of the world to another is available through the Gate if you have purchased a Sapphire. Open World The area of the world is 1,000,000 square kilometers! The world is divided into two continents, several islands and archipelagos. The Navigator will show you the world at a glance. Each race, or faction, has two capitals - located on different parts of the map. Cities and Settlements Cities are located along the caravan routes, offering protection, production facilities, and storage for your property. Access to cities directly depends on a character’s reputation. By purchasing a license, a character can build their own settlement in any vacant and suitable place. Your own settlement provides more opportunities than an existing city. Each floating island has a city with unique capabilities. There also are cities that sell rare magical items and upgrades! Aircraft There are dozens of ships and airships in the game world. They all differ in class and characteristics. Yachts are heavy transporters with a large hold capacity, that are distinguished by their speed and maneuverability. Warships are equipped with much more weapons. Strekolets can be used for reconnaissance, fast movement, bombing, or a surprise missile and torpedo strike on a target. Guilds It isn’t just player characters that can join guilds, but also NPC. Prominent representatives of NPC guilds: Merchants, Outcasts, Demon Minions, Dragon Flocks. Events A bastion is a monumental complex with regeneration capabilities. Each bastion controls one of the world’s territories. A bastion generates rare items and collects taxes from all mined resources in the territory into its warehouse. Big races are mass strekolet races with no restrictions on the type and modifications of those. The use of magic and weapons is allowed. Bounty hunters destroy the property of outlaw captains for a reward. War is a battle between the fleets of the border cities. But also - a great opportunity to earn some money or capture a ship of your liking! Migration - four times a year, the world comes to a standstill. Thousands of dragons leave their nests to search for better places. During this time, dragons will fly right into your path! Lottery 6 out of 36 - a chance to hit the jackpot! Seasonally planned events and activities.
Short Description: LUCKCATCHERS2 is a massive multiplayer online game in an open world inhabited by fire-breathing dragons. Travel using various aircraft. Choose your path. Become a brave adventurer, pirate, bounty hunter, transporter or manufacturer. Live in cities or build your own settlements.

Detailed Description: Early Beta Access Please play the demo and leave your feedback! About the Game We look forward to your feedback! We are releasing this game as a demo and aim to improve it based on player feedback. Please press F8 in-game to provide feedback, or join our Discord to leave your thoughts! You have been resurrected as a small spark in a world teeming with enemies. Borrow the strength of historical heroes to defeat your foes. Commander Quest is a one-of-a-kind roguelike born from a genre combination of deck-building card games and real-time strategy. Experience unique and deep gameplay where you strategize unit synergies and watch the results unfold on the battlefield with cute but brutal fantasy units. Various Races and Commanders You will become various historical heroes leading your army, exploring a cute but brutal fantasy world. Imbue the soul of your chosen hero into the bodies of different races and embark on your expedition! Through the combination of deck-building roguelike and auto-battle RTS, experience exciting battles with diverse synergies and unit affinities. Deck Building To navigate this uniquely charming world, you'll need to grow your deck through various experiences as you progress. Victory in battle rewards you with gold for use in shops and events, food for strength in emergencies, and card rewards. Trade at the mobile shop run by goblin merchants for your commanders, collecting the best synergy cards to prepare for the next battle. As you progress, you may encounter intriguing events like meeting environmental groups trying to protect rat swarms or goblin salesmen offering savings plans. Choose the most helpful options from these events to grow further, but don't forget—things can go wrong... Dangerous Battles In each battle, you can summon units by placing cards on the summon tiles. Unlike other card games, these units come to life on the battlefield, automatically engaging enemy units! Once you end your turn, the summoned units move according to their roles and effects, meeting and fighting the enemy. Every unit and battlefield considers various tactical elements, including the basics of anvil and hammer, flanking, and more. Analyze the patterns of encountered enemies and make the best choices using the cards available each turn. Unlock New Cards Did you reach the end of the prepared journey? Or did your run end prematurely? Either way, it's okay! Your challenges always bear fruit. When you finish a run, it is scored in various ways, and the accumulated experience points are tallied based on your score. Gain experience and level up with each race and commander to unlock new cards, relics, and commander skills! Then aim for those unlocked cards in your next challenge!

Detailed Description: 🏰 Forge Your Destiny, Create Your Legacy! Seize the opportunity to pave your own way, conjure the realms of your imagination, whether they be grand Kingdoms, bustling Cities, or fantastical Worlds. Your journey starts now – take the leap and turn your dream world into a vibrant reality today! 🌐 Design, Create, Build – Unleash Your World, Your Rules! In Graal Worlds, the canvas is yours! Dive into the depths of creativity with the option to craft your world in exquisite 2D or immersive 3D by securing your own server. Populate it with unique monsters, unleash menacing foes, or let your imagination run wild – your server, your rules. Build majestic kingdoms for you and your comrades to conquer or explore; the possibilities are as boundless as your vision. 👥 Join Thriving Realms and Dynamic Communities! Embark on a journey through diverse servers and immerse yourself in vibrant communities. Whether you fancy the unique old-school MMORPG vibes of GraalOnline Zodiac or the nostalgic 2D allure of Unholy Nation for a classic MMO experience, GraalOnline Worlds caters to every adventurer. 🚀 Play Anytime, Anywhere – Uninterrupted Multiplatform Adventure! Seamlessly traverse between Steam, IOS, and Android, because your epic journey is relentless! Share victories, venture into uncharted territories, and connect with like-minded builders. GraalOnline Worlds transcends the realm of a mere game; it's a gateway to adventure, accessible at your fingertips or with the click of a mouse! **Play Your Beloved Graal Titles** - Immerse yourself in the classics and latest releases! **Discover New Realms on Fresh Servers** - Explore uncharted territories, each with its unique charm! **Sneak Peeks into Upcoming Titles** - Be the first to witness the future – exclusive glimpses into upcoming games! **Free In-Game Editing Tools** - Shape your world effortlessly with powerful editing tools at your fingertips! **Connect with Game Designers** - Join a thriving community of developers, collaborate, and bring your projects to life! Note to Developers: Connect to 'Worlds Client' from your Desktop Graal Client to configure who has access to your Server.

Detailed Description: Monologue is a visual novel that immerses the reader in a world of internal struggles and hopes, tinged with sadness, but with the possibility of a brighter tomorrow. This story of a sad man celebrating the new year alone serves as a reminder of the importance of caring for each other and spreading kindness around us. Indeed, in the darkness of loneliness, a holiday can become the most difficult test for those who are left without help and support. The plot develops through the hero's inner thoughts, memories of past New Year's evenings with loved ones, and hope for change in the future. The meeting of midnight becomes a point of revision for the protagonist, an opportunity to find meaning in his loneliness and find a path to his own happiness. On the night of December 31 to January 1, the hero of our story finds himself alone in his small apartment. The whole city shines with bright lights, and the streets are filled with laughter and joy of welcoming the new year. However he standing on his balcony, feels only a sad atmosphere around. This visual novel is a short but vivid immersion into the world of loneliness during a festive moment. Completing the game leaves the player with a deep sense of reflection and perhaps a unique insight into their own experiences in similar moments.
Short Description: In this short but profound story, you will discover that the New Year is not only fun, but also a time for self-reflection. Immerse yourself in an emotional journey that will leave you thoughtful and perhaps with a new perspective on the meaning of this holiday.

Detailed Description: Over 150 unique monsters! A massive RPG with an abundance of rich content. Train your monster with the goal of becoming the champion! Only the main character's partner possesses the cheat move called Cheat Tackle. It ensures a guaranteed first strike and a one-hit kill. In the easy mode, you can even use it endlessly! In this world, there exists mystical creatures known as Yarimon. Known as the loner protagonist with the weakest Yarimon... until now, that is. In a surprising turn of events, the protagonist's Yarimon partner learned a godly-powerful move with a power level of 800,000 called the Cheat Tackle. With this, the protagonist's world completely changed, as this move will one-shot any opponent in battle (though it is only usable once per battle). Of course, it would be foolish to believe that one can become the champion with just a single move. Therefore, a trainer must continue to hone their skills and diversify their strategies. With that said, defeating my childhood friend for the first time is already a crazy accomplishment. I can finally get back some of the money I lost to her... Afterwards, I set out on an adventure after my childhood friend told me she was going on a journey and pressured me to do the same. As I am adventuring, I slowly unravel the secret of this world. This is when I felt like my journey had really begun. Aim to complete the Yarimon Encyclopedia (Yaridex)!! Monster-taming RPG Collect a variety of Yarimon and strive relentlessly towards the championship! Gain EXP by battling either wild Yarimon or trainers. With the advent of EXP shards, you will also be able to freely allocate EXP to your favorite Yarimon! Uncover the truth and secrets that are hidden within this world! Explore the secrets hidden in this world, gradually unveiling it's truth! Over 150 monsters Pixel art for each character Illustrations for each character along with various facial expressions Having a monster index

Detailed Description: Age of Water - Gold Edition Includes 3000 Corks and 250 000 Medallions. Corks will come in handy when you need to buy in-game resources from vendors and repair your ship, whereas medallions can be used to purchase decorations. Please note that there are no microtransactions in the game, and both currencies can only be earned via gameplay. Replaces four common starting boats with upgraded boats of the Barracuda team and three ordinary crew members with crewmen from the Barracuda team. More advanced boats can only be earned via gameplay. 3000 corks; 250 000 medallions (on top of 20 000 medallions from standard edition) Upgraded version of the crew: a skin for Alter Ego, Kitty Sark and Jack Wiley. Upgraded version of the crew: Alter Ego, Kitty Sark and Jack Wiley will have some different skills on early levels compared to the base edition of the game. On later levels the crew stats of both editions become the same. Start with Pirate Boat (instead of Rubber boat) Better Dory boat will be given in the prologue upon completing the quest New Boat; Bigger and sturdier boat (Skadi Boat or Sofiya Longboat) is given upon completion of the shipwright quest We Need a Bigger Boat (instead of Njord Boat or Sonja Longboat). Note! Those additional boats (Dory, Skadi Boat, Sofiya Longboat) will be available for construction on the base. About the Game Become a sea captain on a post-apocalyptic Earth completely covered in water and go on an adventure in a huge open world. Sail through storms, fight and trade, capture other people's boats or build your own, extract resources from the bottom of the ocean, reveal the secrets of the Age of Water world. Water post-apocalypse The ocean destroyed a once great civilization, but people survived and adapted. They built settlements on the roofs of tall buildings and the tops of other man-made structures. People travel across the ocean in tiny boats and huge combat vessels. The ocean provides everything they need, including extractable resources on the seabed. And yet, the dream of real land is still alive. True open world Explore the world at your own pace, discover new settlements and meet their inhabitants. Complete tasks, search for and extract valuable resources from the bottom of the ocean, earn money on trade or simply sell the artifacts you have obtained, and when you get the idea of how this world works, build your own base. Hundreds of unique ships Build boats from scratch or modify existing ones. Players have access to dozens of hulls and hundreds of parts, from which they can assemble anything ranging from a small boat to a hefty vessel 30 meters long, and then install equipment, armor and weapons. It’s important not to forget to gather a team of good crewmembers so that there is someone to stand behind machine guns and cannons or do other work on board. Fierce naval battles Pirates are always waiting for you at sea, and in some cases more aggressive players even start to chase you, so do not forget to install enough guns on your deck. You can destroy an enemy vessel, or you can capture it in battle and take it for yourself forever. Adventures might also get you into storming enemy fortresses and defending allied settlements! Personal naval base This shelter is reliably protected from enemies, and it allows a player to organize the production of everything that the captain may need on it. Build factories for the production of equipment, weapons, hulls for boats of all sizes, as well as the necessary resources. Flexible balance between PvE and PvP At first, you will only meet computer opponents, but later you can challenge other players if you are confident enough in your skills and gear. Always be on the lookout: if your task is to transport illegal goods, then other players may well take the quest to hunt smugglers. In Age of Water, everyone decides for themself who they are today - a peaceful traveler or a bloodthirsty pirate.
Short Description: Age of Water is an online adventure game set on a post-apocalyptic Earth completely covered in water. Sail through storms, fight and trade, capture other people's boats or build your own, extract resources from the bottom of the ocean and reveal the secrets of the Age of Water world.
About the Game: Become a sea captain on a post-apocalyptic Earth completely covered in water and go on an adventure in a huge open world. Sail through storms, fight and trade, capture other people's boats or build your own, extract resources from the bottom of the ocean, reveal the secrets of the Age of Water world. Water post-apocalypse The ocean destroyed a once great civilization, but people survived and adapted. They built settlements on the roofs of tall buildings and the tops of other man-made structures. People travel across the ocean in tiny boats and huge combat vessels. The ocean provides everything they need, including extractable resources on the seabed. And yet, the dream of real land is still alive. True open world Explore the world at your own pace, discover new settlements and meet their inhabitants. Complete tasks, search for and extract valuable resources from the bottom of the ocean, earn money on trade or simply sell the artifacts you have obtained, and when you get the idea of how this world works, build your own base. Hundreds of unique ships Build boats from scratch or modify existing ones. Detailed Description: Blast through the endless levels of hell! From the creators of Project Starship comes a new and nightmarish arcade shoot’em up experience. Void Gore casts you as an ace pilot descending through the levels of hell and getting rich in the process. Earn coins as you take down supernatural horrors in pulse-pounding vertical scrolling style, then spend them on upgrades to keep yourself alive and prove your skills against online leaderboards! Survive waves of enemies to reach the next layer of malice and despair, collect power-ups, face increasingly challenging foes and add to your score multiplier as you chain multiple kills. Survive as long as possible and prove your skills as the ultimate pilot. It’s all just a simulation, after all… or is it? Features: Survive the unpredictable and endless depths of hell! Adapt to each challenge as levels are randomized. Enjoy a classically gritty pixel art style with parallax scrolling. Chain kills to increase your multiplier and shoot for higher scores! Earn coins to spend on critical ship upgrades. Prove your skills against online leaderboards!
